text: Best Eye Doctor in Dothan !! Custome3r service is awesome and they are fast and freindly !! and affordable.

name: Karina Rodriguez
text: If I could rate this place zero stars, I would. Vanessa, the America's Best associate, was rude, racist, and very unprofessional with her duties. I scheduled an appointment for my dad in which she screamed at like if he were deaf with the most unnecessary attitude. If she handed him a sheet to read the letters off of and he went to this establishment to get an eye exam done because he clearly can't see well, this woman should have been understanding and patient. She was one of the most rude customer service associates I have ever encountered and I do not recommend this place to anyone. The America's Best in Opelika, AL was nothing at all compared to this unprofessional establishment in Dothan, AL so if you have time and want good service, go to that one instead.

resp.text: Hi Karina, I’m sorry for the rude behavior of our associate.  I would be happy to put you in touch with someone from the management team if you are interested. Just email me at americasbest@nationalvision.com with your contact information and which store you visited. Thank you. – Nancy

text: I do NOT recommend. I drove from out of town to come to this place because they told me they were VSP providers. Well, theyre not! Every staff member had an attitude. I'm not one to put reviews out on people, but I am just plain fed up with people working in the public eye that have attitudes. These people hire you to be accommodating and reasonable. Save your time and do not go here for your eye care.

name: Tanya Riley
text:
We recently lost our vision coverage due to cutbacks at company. I called Americas best for prices. I usually buy Escada frames or designer but no way no. I am disabled and budget is tight. The lady who answered was awesome and provided me with info I needed. As a former V.P. of a staffing company, I was so impressed by her I told her I would hire her if I still worked. Imagine my surprise to find out it was the manager, Nancy speaking to me.
I have appt next friday 25th of may. Lets hope it continues to be such a good experience and I get quality glasses. Ps. I called back with another question and the receptionist was just as nice.
Cross your fingers. My budget is tight but I'm hoping.
Tanya Riley

name: Wendy Meadows
text:
2/27/18*****I have just learned from the main cust care line that my glasses were not turned in until 2/21 which means the dothan office held my glasses for a week before turning them in to be repaired. i am beyond furious with this place. They are the absolute worst place ever. PEOPLE PLEASE READ ALL OF THESE BAD REVIEWS. DO NOT GET YOUR GLASSES HERE!!
i have very poor vision and recently my glasses broke. Thank god i purchased the warranty for free replacement. whats bad for me is that i don't have a 2nd pair since the original pair cost almost $300 due to bifocals. this place has the worst customer service. each day i call to check on my replacement glasses i am given a different story about where my glasses are. i have been unable to drive at night, i have had severe headaches everyday from not having my glasses. i am having trouble seeing at work, having to use cheap readers which are killing my eyes.  this place refuses to call the lab and check status on my glasses. they have no compassion for what i am going thru. i have wore glasses since i was in the 5th grade. i am now 50. this has been the worst 2 weeks for me not having my glasses. america's best are the worst. no compassion, no customer service. the staff makes up lies/stories about your order just to get you off the phone. i was referred here a year ago to get my glasses and i have referred several since but after this experience i will never go back or recommend anyone. i will be moving my business somewhere else for sure. you can't tell me that they have no communication with the lab that makes the glasses for their customers. that's the biggest bunch of bull i have ever heard. replacement glasses for someone with bad vision should be able to get some kind of rush service.

resp.text: Hi Wendy, I hope by the time you receive my response that you've gotten a call that your glasses are in.  If not, please email me at americasbest@nationalvision.com.  Include the location you visited and the best way to reach you and I will find out what the delay is. - Nancy

name: Jaye Full
text: This has to be one of the worst places I have been in my life . The customer service does not exist and the management is very unprofessional. I caught nothing but attitude because I wanted to pick up some freaking contacts. They was not helpful at all and honestly I'm not sure they even know what they are doing I was told to come back 3 times before they got it right. They do not ask if you want to join the club they just charge you. Instead of being nice and considerate they give you 20 reasons why it take sooooooo long. The rep presented no help at all only a excuse and attitude. I was only there to pic up contacts. She continued to talk under her breath to others about me and sent that bulldog manager that rushed out to me and threw me some trial contacts to me (I was there to pick up my prescribed contacts ) so I told her that I was there to get my contacts and she stormed off and came back . She didn't say I'm sort for the inconvenience or nothing just sat her round Pokémon butt down and stated the price so I had to ask her about what I was getting and she abruptly said what I was getting and rolled her eyes ( imagine that a manager). Please go only if you are desperate and on a budget. Hopefully you never get that hard up. They have much better choice and other places that truly care about their customers. Buyers beware. The disrespect you get is bad and not to mention I was calm the whole time. Still received attitude. This place is Horrible please review before you go to avoid the mistake I made. The Doctor is ok he's pretty easy going and attentive but those women up front and the manager are the worst. I would give no stars but you have to use one.

name: Heather Daniel
text: I am unfortunately someone who doesn’t go to the Eye Dr. To be honest I have never been to even see one. So you can imagine my nerves were through the roof with not knowing what to expect. First Dr Teichmiller was super informative with perfect bed side manner. The staff were superb, from first walking in, going to the exam room, to picking out my glasses, to the fitting and then to leaving. The nerves just swept right away thanks to these ladies. And even though I received news I didn’t want (eyeglasses) I was able to walk out of there knowing I had some beautiful glasses coming to me soon. It was actually at random that I came to the Decatur location but I am super glad I did. The best experience I’ve ever received hands down and I would recommend them to anyone who ask. Thank you all so much for making my first experience enjoyable and less nerve racking. You guys keep up the amazing work and I hope Dr Teichmiller knows how blessed he is to have you ladies!!!!!!

resp.text: Hello Heather, thank you for taking the time to share such a wonderful experience. Our aim is to ensure that our patients receive thorough, knowledgeable, and personalized care from beginning to end. We're ecstatic to learn that our team could ensure both your comfortability and satisfaction while assisting you in picking out your perfect pair of eyeglasses! Dr. Teichmiller is one of our best and we can't wait to share such amazing feedback! Thank you for entrusting us to care for your vision needs. We look forward to serving you again in the future. Have a fantastic day.

text: Very nice people that got me into a nice pair of glasses and worked with me the whole time.

resp.text: Hi Ian, Thank you for your feedback and 5 star review. We are so happy to hear that your recent visit to our Decatur office was both friendly and positive. We hope you are enjoying your new glasses! We look forward to seeing you again soon! Kind Regards, Patient Relations

text: I had a wonderful experience. The staff was all very friendly and sweet they helped me pick out the frames I wanted and listened to everything I told them I will continue to go to this eye dr

name: Taylor Bracken
text: Dr. Teichmiller and his staff are AMAZING! They are super sweet and make you feel so welcomed! They have the best personalities and, you can definitely tell they all love their job! My husband has worn CRT contact lenses since he was in the 8th grade, and he was limited to what eye doctor he could go to because not all of them do CRT's. He just so happened to get a decent scratch on his eye from them one night and, could barely open his eye. So, the next morning I called his eye doctor to get him in ASAP and they said they couldn't seem him for a month! So I told him I would find a place even if we have to drive out of state, but i ended up finding the MyEyeDr office in Decatur, AL and once I gave them a call they had him in the next day!! They were just WONDERFUL! He was very pleased with his service here, and needless to say Dr. Teichmiller and his staff will continue to be his go to for all his eye care needs! He recommended I go their for my exam and, so I did and he was right I WILL NOT be going anywhere else for my eye exams! They are just super helpful, caring, and will really help you stay in your budget! Thank you all for helping me make the right decision for my eye care needs! And thank you all for treating my husband in his emergent situation when noone else would!!! Yall all would be 10's on my star chart, if there were that many to give!! text: I have nothing but appreciation for the service I received today at the Eyemart Express on Gadsden Hwy. However, these three ladies have been so phenomenal on the last two visits to the store that I had to share my appreciation!! Well done, and thank you!!

resp.text: Awesome! That's exactly what we like to hear - we hope to see you again soon!

text: Kimberly was amazing!! They were very busy with the phone ringing off the hookahs store busy with customers but she didn’t miss a stride!! resp.text: Awesome! That's exactly what we like to hear - we hope to see you again soon!

text: Went in to schedule an appointment and tell them what the issue with my eyes are. The doctor (tall gray haired white guy wearing glasses) said “that makes zero sense, get the hell out of my store now”. I was extremely polite when I walked in and he shoved me out of the store. I have a problem with driving in the rain at night and tried to explain to him when he asked me what was going on with my vision. I don’t know what his attitude was for and forcing me out of the store but definitely do not recommend them after the brief experience I had.

resp.text: Hi Jared S. We never like to hear that you had a less than stellar experience in any part of the process. Unfortunately, the doctor and their staff are not employed by us, and we recommend that you reach out to their office directly to address your concerns.

text: Just left this place happy as ever. I’ve dealt with them twice already and the staff could not have been nicer. Cheryl was amazing, and saving was a plus.. would recommend!

text: Really good experience at the Trussville Eyemart Express.  Thorough eye exam and friendly staff.  Dr Irwin is great.  Prompt and professional.  All the staff were very attentive to my needs and I never felt rushed.  I will be back.

text:
Before going to Eye Mart Express, I checked out their website.   So I had an idea of what I wanted before I got there. Over all great experience.  Fast, right price,
knowledgeable staff.

name: Denise Bates
text: I went to the store with my prescription and ordered glasses, biggest mistake ever. First thing I picked up my glasses on a Monday two days later my lens fell out, they offered to order me another pair. The new pair came and I went to picked them up. I noticed when I put them on that I could not see clearly, they made several adjustments and I left with the glasses because I had to return to work but throughout the day I still had trouble seeing clearly. The next morning I put the glasses back on and still no clear vision. I returned to the store later that morning, they made several more adjustments and still no clear vision. I now have a pair of glasses that I paid money for and can not wear, tried to return the glasses and was told that they do not do refunds. I researched eyemart return policy and it clearly states that they do offer refunds.

resp.text: Hi Denise Bates. Thank you for your feedback. We hate to see that you did not have a 5-star experience. Please feel free to reach out to the store at 205-661-3030 and ask to speak with our manager Kimberley, so we may have the opportunity to make this right.

text: Super fast service, great guarantee, competitive prices and more importantly,, 've been wearing glasses for 20 years and I'd never seen so well, the Dr at Trussville is hands down the best. Definitely coming back

They are out of network but I am always pleased with the staff and speedy service.

text: Fabulous experience! Dr. Erwin did a thorough eye exam. Brittany was so kind, patient, and willing to find the best cost-effective glasses on my budget. After getting my new prescription, I was able to see perfectly! Highly recommend!

text: Zero stars for this place!!!  Dr was a complete jerk to patients and staff. Front desk people were very rude as well..me:Ma'am, do you have youth size frames.  She looked right at me and walked off.

name: gin2772
text:
I came in with my dad 3 days ago for him to get an exam & get new glasses. I had already had an exam elsewhere, but did not have my prescription with me. I told them this. I said when I come back with my dad to get his glasses the next day, I'll have it with me. I had picked out the frames I wanted.

They were all so super nice & helpful to my dad. They took proper time with his insurance, fitting, asking him all kinds of questions about what he wanted & everything.

When we came back the next day, the lady didn't ask for my insurance, rushed through me & she didn't ask me any of the kinds of questions she asked my dad, like did I want tinted lens or anything else. When I asked how she knew what to charge me when she didn't even bother to see what insurance I had or what discounts I may be eligible for, she said it was because I said yesterday that I did not have insurance. That is a total lie & doesn't make any sense on so many levels. I had to wait a while on my dad the day before, so why not just go ahead & get glasses while I'm waiting if insurance was the only issue? When you apply, doesn't it take a while to kick in? If I didn't have it the day before, then I probably wouldn't have had it the day after either.

She just wanted to scam me for some reason. I agree with some of these other reviews that said these people are scammers. It's like they make up their mind about you right after you walk in the door. They must have liked my dad, but decided to try to scam me.

I work for the federal government just like my dad. I have good insurance just like he does, but they decided to treat me like either a loser who still lives at home with their parents even though I am 42 or a total homeless bum. Well, if that's the case, then how could I have paid for my glasses? I guess my dad would have because in their minds I am a loser who still needs my parents funds to survive. I could not believe they were so nice to him & so horrible to me. Keep on driving when you see this place.

name: Jim Perkins
text:
Brittany is a outstanding assistant,  great personality. She was so helpful, and service oriented!!
Super employee!!

text: Needed an extra pair of glasses... Without insurance, I Purchased two pair for 25% of the cost I paid for a single pair with insurance a few months ago. Plastic lenses with no special coatings (these are after all back-up extra glasses)... These have become my primary glasses... Well satisfied. Great value... Oh.. and they were ready in less than 2 hours!  :>)

name: Vikki Taylor
text: Excellent service.Professional and genuinely care about your well being.Good price and friendly atmosphere.Will recommend to all my friends.

name: Rikesha Foster
text:
Not quite sure what to make of this place. My sales clerk, Phyllis, was helpful about the type of frame I should get according to my face structure....after I was looking around about 20 minutes. When I entered the shop, I told her I needed a quote for frames and lenses, and without even looking up, she told me to pick out some frames and we would go from there. I asked Phyllis shouldn't she at least look at my prescription since it was pretty strong because I knew all frames don't work with all prescriptions. She glances at my prescription and says" Oh yeah, it is pretty strong", and tells me to stay away from rimless and metal frames. I really should have left then and went somewhere else, but decided to look around. Phyllis comes to assist after about 20 minutes. She brings over about four pair of frames for me to try and critiqued each one . I narrowed my choices down to the pair I really liked. As I was getting fitted, due to my special prescription, I was quoted a time of 14 days. Insert sad face here. Oh well, that's the price I pay for being a nerd and reading all those books in dim light as a youngster.

My glasses came back in about 10 days. After trying them on and getting them adjusted, I discover my right lens is scratched / cracked smack dab in the middle . While they agree to reorder the lens, I am quoted another 14 days for it to come back. Phyllis suggests that I go ahead and wear this pair to get used to them and when my new lens comes in, they will just switch the damaged lens out. I'm disappointed to say the least, but happy to get new glasses I was well over due for. Needless to say, after my replacement lens comes in, I won't be coming back to this location ever again.

resp.text: Hello Rikesha! Thank you for your review. We are very sorry your didn't have the best experience and I will make sure this is addressed with the management team to make sure we learn from this situation.   Please do not hesitate to reach out to our customer care department at 1-888-372-2763 if there is anything we can do to improve your experience. Thank you! Mary, Eyemart Express Customer Care Team

They were all very professional and helpful. I will be a long time customer of Eye Mart Express and will return with my family members should they need glasses. I would also recommend Eye Mart Express to anyone.

text: Going to Eyemart Express was quick and easy.  Was seen and done within an hour. Plus my 2 pair of glasses were done within the next hour. Prices are great even without insurance.

text: Went on a Saturday afternoon...Great experience and fast, friendly service! Yolanda was professional & knowledgeable in assisting us with our eyewear selection. Our glasses were ready in less than 30 minutes and we have no complaints. Highly recommend the Trussville location!

text: This is the first time I've visited an Eyemart Express.  I was very pleased with the service.  Kimberly was very helpful and professional.  Great prices and good customer service.

text: Best eye care center I've been to in all my years.  Super friendly staff.

name: Mark
text: I carried my current prescription into Eyemart express and had a pair of eyeglasses made. Once I tried on the new glasses. I could not see with the newly made glasses. I explained it to the Manager Kimberly Dials. That they added someone else prescription into my glasses or something was not correct. She takes my new glasses to the back and comes back and tell me to try them on again. This time they had red marking on them. She then tells me that the glasses are correct.(that I have not doubt) I tell her I can’t see with them correct or not. She then tell me to take the glasses home and start wearing them first thing in the morning. Reason is was late in the day and my eyes were tired this was a new prescription. She then tell me to take the glasses to my eye doctor and have him look at the new glasses. I did not tell her that I have another pair of glasses with the same prescription that was made at a different retailer that I have no issues with. Eyemart express does not want to admit they made a mistake by adding someone else’s prescription into a pair of glasses I had made.

name: Gregg Mitchell
text: Excellent staff, very informative .My first pair of glasses and the staff made me feel very comfortable. Thank you Eyemart.

name: John Heiser
text: Good prices and usually good service. But the last time I got glasses there (two pairs of single-vision, same prescription, and a third pair, single vision), the technician mistakenly (carelessly?) swapped the left and right eye prescriptions. At first, I thought it was just "hey, it's a new prescription I just need to get used to," but ultimately I took them back and the problem was discovered. They took care of it at no charge. Still....

text: We had a great experience, already had a Rx for glasses. Went in picked out a couple of pair of glasses and they were ready to be picked up within an hour of leaving the store.

text: Friendly, knowledgeable, and eager to please.  Excellent Value..

text: Great prices, selection, customer service and turnaround time!!!

name: Marsha Smith-Horstead
text: Brittany was fabulous.

name: Beth M
text: Went to the Trussville Eyemart yesterday to pick up my glasses. I had sun glasses and regular glasses both made with progressive lenses. the left side looked very blurry when I put them on. They checked my prescription and concluded that the glasses were made correctly.  A very knowledgeable lady named Felisha concluded that the Opthamologist who gave the script had written a plus sign instead of a minus in front of the left eye on the script. They checked it with my old glasses to be sure. They are now remaking both pairs of glasses with the correct prescription for free!  What a great catch!  Thanks to all the people who helped me at the store.

name: M Adams
text:
I had a very pleasant experience at the Trussville Eyemart yesterday. Unfortunately, my lenses were not in stock so they are being ordered - which is why there is a 4* not 5. When I was ready to complete my order, I had 3 frames I was deciding between and Ashley and the receptionist for the Doctor were very helpful (and unanimous) in pointing me towards the frames I chose.
The final pricing was very fair for stylish lenses with a high prescription (there was no choice to not get polycarbonate lenses). I was almost swayed to purchase the second pair, but I do not wear glasses enough (mostly contacts) to warrant buying them. The pricing structure was interesting, and it would make sense for someone who had a very basic prescription, and not for someone who needs a higher quality frame, or the extras (anti-reflective, etc).
I would recommend Eyemart in Trussville, and am looking forward to receiving my pair of glasses!

name: Leshon Speights
text: The staff was very kind and professional. They waited on us and even got the glasses right before closing. That’s what you call customer service!

text: Sadly I had lost my glasses and needed replacement pronto. I found them doing a good search and arrived 5 mins before they opened with no appointment. Dr was fantastic and personable. Bummer they are out of network for VSP even with that everything was reasonably priced and my glasses after example took 45 mins! 2 pairs. 45 mins! Wow. Yep still can't find my original pair. Ty eyemart!

name: kristi robbins
text: I really needed prescription sunglasses and decided to take my RX to eyemart in Trussville Saturday afternoon.  There were several customers in the store but I was greeted as soon as I entered the door.  I believed the ads stating 2 pair $74.78.but this is next to impossible.  I ended up spending $119 for 1 pair.  The frames were $9.95 but the progressive added $98.66.  Trying to get the advertised pricing is for people who don't need glasses.  Araseli helped me and did a wonderful job but I really do not think anyone could explain the pricing. Even though the pricing was crazy, I was happy with my final decision.  Araseli told me the glasses would be ready Monday but when I got home around 2 hours later I received the text the glasses were ready.  I really like my new glasses but noticed when I got home there is writing and lines on one lens.  I plan to take the glasses back Monday and see if they can clean this off or replace the lens.

name: Meko Smith
text: I went there for same day glasses but had to wait 3,they are very helpful and courteous  but should not advertise same day glasses because it's not possible everyday obviously

text: I had new glasses but I bumped them and knocked them a little out of alignment.  Asked walmart to adjust them.  They did.  But they also melted my lenses so I couldn't see out of them. They told me that I should've told them that they were progressive lenses, so this wouldn't have happened. I have worn glasses for 20+years, and never has anyone told me i should tell them their business.They reordered these glasses, but when they came, I could see distance but not reading at all.  Shaun Morgan , the manager, told me there was nothing more that he could do.  He argued back and forth with me and his manager.  He was rude and unwilling to help me at all.   So I have worn these glasses for 2 years, but cannot read out of them.

text: Very good place!! I was in a tight spot with needing my contacts and I was able to do a walk in. Dr. Clardy was very professional and nice and he’s one of the only places who will take my horrible insurance lol will be going to him for my future visits. Also, the staff was very nice!

text: I’ve been seeing eye doctors since 4th grade, but Dr. Clardy is by far the best I’ve ever encountered.  That’s the reason I’ve been his patient for over 20 years. Everyone in his office is as friendly and professional as he is. I highly recommend!

text: Love Dr. Clardy and the awesome ladies who work in his office.  They are always very thorough and answer all of my questions. I always have the best time talking with them and and they are great with my kids, as well.

text: I have been going to Dr Clardy for years, and he is great but I absolutely cannot tolerate his staff anymore.  He needs to clean house! His office called me, did not leave a message, and when I called them back the lady was extremely rude to me because I didn't know why they called. THEN they ordered the wrong contact lens for me, and acted like it was my fault.  The last straw is when I had to go back up there to pick up the correct lens, not only did I have to PAY for the new lenses, but staff was rude to me again.  I explained I was there to TRADE the lens out, and she rudely said "you are not here to TRY them out because we don't do trials."  She obviously misunderstood me, but there was no need to talk to me in that tone of voice!  I am a paying customer! I should say was, because I will not be back. If I want to be treated like that, I'll just go to the mall...

text: Dr. Clardy is thorough and explains each step of the exam. His staff, Phylisia and Courtney, are very friendly and offered a same day appointment. Very pleasant experience.

name: Samantha Carrington
text: I went into the Trussville, AL location just to find out what it might cost me to purchase glasses and I was immediately greeted with warm smiles, kind hearts & an extremely knowledgable staff. The store was clean and stocked with so many great choices. What a wonderful experience! My family & I will definitely be purchasing our eye glasses from this store from now on. Thank you for providing me with such excellent customer service.

name: Jennifer “CraftyJenn” Baxter
text:
I don't recommend this place at all. I found some nice frames there that fit me perfectly and was so excited to get my first pair of glasses so I could see better. I got my lens order put in and was told it could take 10-14 days to get them back since they don't make glasses there. I was fine with that. When day 12 came along, I called to check on them to have an idea of when I'd get them. The girl looked in the computer and said that the lens place hadn't gotten them yet, but they should soon and the 14 days wasn't up. I called back on day 14 to check on them and was told they were probably in the box for that day and if not, they'd be there the next day and that they'd call me the next day by noon if they couldn't find them. I called back an hour before closing the next day only to be told that my glasses were most likely in a box that got lost. So I waited for 2 weeks for glasses that went missing. I then I had to search  for an identical frame from another store.
If you don't want to chance your glasses being lost, go somewhere else. I did get a full refund, but the headache with this place wasn't worth it. Oh and they don't communicate with each other so noone knows what anyone else has told you.

name: Rayn Lafollette
text: I had a great experience at America’s best. Everyone at the front desk was polite and quick to assist me. Getting my eye exam the doctor was very informative and helpful as this was my first time needing eye glasses. After I was not rushed when being extremely picky about picking glasses. When I finally picked out glasses It was very helpful to know all of my buying options and all the add ons that were available to me. I would 10/10 recommend America’s best in trussville.

name: Christie Steeley
text: Our experience with this location in Trussville, AL was SPECTACULAR!!!!! FABULOUS customer service!!! The manager, Robin was so kind and helpful! And Madison and Jamie were INCREDIBLE with my daughter. My daughter struggles with much mental illness and exceptions. And these ladies were very patient and kind with her. They put her at ease so easily. I was anxious about the experience with my daughter.... But it turned out to be a pleasant afternoon! I just can't praise them enough!! Very clean store! Very well run! Very organized! Very timely! THANK YOU ladies for such a blessed experience!

name: Jesslin Williams
text: I will never go here again for glasses. The person who was helping me checked my insurance and calculated my frames, I paid a portion out of pocket that day. Fast forward two weeks or so, I receive a bill from America's Best for the exact amount I paid that day. I found it to be shady and I was not happy with the service I received when I went to pick my frames up after being called to do so. The lady acted like I was not suppose to be there then proceeded to give me the wrong frames.

resp.text: I’m very sorry that happened. Let me know if you need assistance getting this resolved.  You can email me at americasbest@nationalvision.com.  It’s very important to include the location you visited, your name and your phone number so we can help as quickly as possible. Thank you, Nancy

name: Lori Weist (Lori D)
text: This place was amazing! The team was professional and I got the perfect glasses! I have recommended to my family and friends and they had great experiences also. We will be returning always to this location.

name: Thomas Everett
text: My visit to America's Best in Trussville was a great experience.  The staff was very pleasant and helpful. There was a large selection of frames. I am very pleased with the fit and quality of my new glasses. I would definitely suggest this  America's Best location to friends, family and even strangers.                            A solid ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ rating.

name: Strange Dreamer
text: This was my first time at the Trussville location and it was a really good experience. The exam didn't take long but I told doctor Beaty I was having a specific issue with my contacts not sitting correctly in my eyes and he made sure to take me back again after my fitting to make sure they were right! I am very happy with my prescription and my experience here! I will be back for sure!

resp.text: Happy to hear you had such a positive experience with us.  We appreciate you taking the time to write a review, thank you for being our customer!

name: Jamie Kennedy
text: I work at this location, so I know how hard our team works to be as efficient and helpful as possible. We care about our patients' experiences!

name: Elena McDaniel
text: I took my son for an exam. I have worn glasses pretty much all my life and this was the fastest eye exam I have ever experienced and that is not a compliment. This appointment didn’t even take 15 minutes!  What could the doctor have possibly checked in that short amount of time? My son’s eyes were NOT dilated and to top it off, his Rx is wrong!!! The script written is for farsightedness and my son is nearsighted. I will not be back and will be in contact with the corporate office.

resp.text: I’m very sorry that happened. I’d be happy to have someone from corporate management reach out to you about this. If you’re interested, you can email me at americasbest@nationalvision.com.  It’s very important to include the location you visited, your name and your phone number so we can help as quickly as possible. Thank you, Nancy

name: Douglas Brock
text: Excellent service.  Both pair came out perfect!!!

name: Alex Avram
text: I recently got glasses from the Trussville location and it was an absolutely amazing experience. It was my first time getting glasses so I was a little nervous and not really sure what to do or what to expect. I was greeted by friendly employees and each person who took care of me was super nice. I had fun chatting with everyone there. One of the girls helped me pick out frames and assured me that I looked good. I couldn't wait for my glasses to come in so I could start wearing them. They came back a week later but unfortunately I noticed that one of my lenses was blurry. So I called the store the next day to let them know and the person I talked to was so kind and friendly on the phone and told me to bring them by so they could have a look at them. When I got there, one of the girls told me she accidentally typed in my Rx wrong. The manager came out and talked to me and she also was VERY NICE!! They got my glasses re-ordered and they were back within I think about 6 days! Super fast!! I am so so IMPRESSED with the level of customer service I was shown. I also work in retail and have since 2013. So I've seen all kinds of craziness! Haha! But these people are a class act. They treated me with respect, kindness and put a smile on my face despite the accident. I wasn't worried about it. I was just glad they got it corrected and I couldn't be happier. I HIGHLY recommend this location if you need glasses! I am going to tell all my friends and family about them! They definitely have my loyalty!

.

text:
I’ve been a patient at VisualEyes for about 3 years.  Dr. Green is simply awesome; his staff is friendly; and his office is super pretty.  Overall, the setting is nice and relaxing and one can’t help but feel good about the experience.

To top it off, Dr. Green is knowledgeable, experienced and extremely humble.  My entire family trusts him with our eye care and after experiencing VisualEyes I can’t imagine going any place else.  I have confidence that Dr. Green and team will continue to exceed expectations and I expect to be a patient for life.

By the way, did I mention VisualEyes has the most modern and advanced technology in Tuscaloosa?   If you have vision concerns, please check them out.  You’ll be glad you did.

resp.text: T Man.  Thanks so much for the kind words and for the trust that you have placed in us.  It is a truly a pleasure taking care of you and your family.

text: Dr. Green is Awesome! So thorough and caring of his patients. He took the time to make sure I understood the options in depth I have with myopia control for my son. I highly recommend! Environment is warm and friendly with GREAT customer service!!

text: Had a comprehensive eye-exam done at VisualEyes recently. The staff was very helpful with the exam and navigating their extensive glasses selection! It was nice to have a doctor actually explain things to me about my eye health and vision. I will be recommending VisualEyes and Dr. Green from now on. Excited about my new glasses as well!

name: Lisa F Katz
text: They use high technology equipment to evaluate your vision.  I think it makes your exam more efficient and accurate.  The only thing I found that wasn’t so great for me was their prices were high on frames.  They have very friendly and helpful staff there.

name: Vicki Ladnier
text: Everyone at VisualEyes made me feel welcome and well-cared for! Always ready to answer my questions and never too busy to take time for me. I would highly recommend VisualEyes to all my friends.

name: Nicole Clements
text: The staff here is amazing- from check-in to check-out!! I don't remember her name but the lady who helped me pick out my frames was the best- not only did she help me pick out frames that she thought would look good on me, but she was MORE than patient with me while I sat there taking forever to make a decision. I can't say enough good things about this place, highly recommend!!!

name: Robin Little
text: I went to see Dr. Green today at Visual Eyes.  I was met with a smile and friendly service.  The doctor was very  thorough and explained everything to me.   They carry a huge selection of glasses and their office is beautiful.  If you are looking for an eye doctor.  I would definitely recommend Visual Eyes.

name: Elisha-Hope Weaver
text: Everyone is friendly, helpful and professional.  Your entire process is explained and they give you an opportunity to ask as many questions you need for complete understanding.  Only cons are 1) the location may a bit remote for some 2) the cost of buying glasses in-house is rather steep; more affordable options are needed.

name: Marsha Richardson
text: State of the art equipment and procedures available. Very friendly staff. Attentive Doctor.

name: Erik Montz
text: The folks at VisualEyes were great. Everyone that was part of my visit was very nice and helpful. From the front desk to Dr. Green to the ladies that helped me pick out my glasses. I highly recommend them to anyone.

name: Service @ T-Town H-D
text: The stafff really went above and beyond for me. I would recommend them above all others hands down. I have lived all over the country and have been in glasses for 34 years. This is the best eye Doctor I have ever been too!

name: Cady Weldon
text: The office staff are all so incredibly nice and they always remember me by name. Both they and the doctor give so much personalized attention and spend as much time with me as I need. The office is in a great location, extremely clean, and upscale, and all of their equipment is state-of-the-art. They have a great selection of frames already, but I have a huge head and have a hard time finding frames that fit comfortably and look good, so they were more than happy to order a bunch of additional demos for me to try, which was such a great convenience! I have have already referred all of my friends and coworkers because I really do just believe this place is the best!

name: Gina Creech
text:
My husband and I traveled from Charleston, SC to see Dr Green.  We heard of his reputation as a very thorough and knowledgeable doctor. We were not disappointed. We had the most thorough exam we have ever had. After having cancer of my lower eyelid and almost loosing my eye, I take my eye care very seriously. Also, I have experienced flashing lights in my peripheral vision.  Dr Green's office uses cutting edge equipment.  Therefore, he was able to use a CT scan of my eye to show and explain in great detail what happened, when I had these episodes.
The staff at VisualEyes are efficient and friendly. The atmosphere in the office is one of caring. The office is comfortable, clean, and beautiful. The selection of eyeware is the best I have ever seen.  There are so many beautiful frames you will be challenged to just pick one frame.  Great care is given by the staff to assist you in finding the perfect pair of glasses. There knowledge of the perfect shape and color for your individual face is unprecedented.

name: Erika Wells
text: The service was exceptional!!

name: Tasha
text: Not only was the staff courteous and showed great hospitality - you feel at home! I was nervous b/c I was having issues due to my astigmatism but i felt very confident leaving the office. Dr. Green was very thorough about imaging, astigmatism, etc. I would definitely recommend!

Our office uses this system to remind patients of their appointments, when glasses or contact lenses are ready for pickup, and when it is time for their exam.  I have temporarily stopped all notifications and reminders for you; please contact our office and so that we can update your communication preferences.

I was so concerned he would be without them until we made it back home. This place is fantastic!

The star rating might improve after the issue is fixed! Also they are a very busy place need to hire more help. Running Billy and Jamal to death.

text: Dr. Valentini, Jamal, Billy...THANK YOU!!! Our time with you was PERFECT!!! The BEST customer service EVER!!! GREAT eye exams, GREAT selection and prices! text: The manager was so polite,very sweet and patient with my daughter like he was her own! He made sure the fit her face perfect. Better than anywhere I’ve been!

name: Lacey Payne
text:
This place is truly amazing and the people are phenomenal!
I was with my (pregnant) sister today who was having some severe agitation in her eye, along with multiple ruptured blood vessels. We were both a little nervous and unsure if she should see a doctor about her eye or if it was something to heal on its own. Thanks to some frightening google results, we decided to call a doctor. I remembered my pastor mentioning this optometrist and giving great reviews, so we called ahead and they got her in immediately!
The doctor was so so nice and had a great personality. I could not have asked for better treatment for my sister during such a stressful time!
A huge thank you to the staff for being so gracious and kind!

text: Awesome experience! My eye exam was quick and thorough. I got my glasses the same day and the guys up front are extremely kind.

text: I really like Dr. Valentini, he is an Army vet and is straight forward with his work. Their service and work is very fast. I will continue to use them. Hooah!!!!

text: By far THE BEST eye doctor I've ever been to! The staff were so welcoming and knowledgeable about their products. Not only can I see now lol but I love my frames! The prices are customer service are unheard of. The location is great too! text: I have gone to the same eye physician half my life and he retired.  So I took a chance on this place and oh my!!!!! text: I was visiting from out of town on a Saturday and had an eye problem that may have required medical attention. He was professional, friendly and ensured I understood my vision problem and terms. This is a family-owned business and if I resided there, I would switch to this optometry clinic for all my vision needs.

She is now seeing without strain & she is thankful for such great care of her fragile eyes. Thank you Billy & Jamal!!! This couldn't have been done without you! Forever grateful ❤.

text: Super pleased with the help I had from Dr. Valentini and his staff! This is one of the best places I've been to in the region, and I've been to a lot. text: Awesome service. I came in and was able to get seen that day. Good quality glasses quickly.

name: Maurice Valentini
text:
Dear Dylan Hulsey,
I am sorry you feel the way you do regarding Alabama Family Optometry 1 Hour Optical. I am a little perplexed at your negative review, regarding our high prices, rude doctor, and limited selection.
I have searched our data base and don't see you as a previous patient, or someone having ordered product from us in the past.
I have reviewed previous posts from you regarding many other business', and it seems you have a long history of leaving negative reviews.
All I ask from you is you actually come  in to our clinic and experience it in real life for yourself.
We have over 1000 frames on display and many different brands, and our prices are actually lower than competing national chains. At AFO1H we have honest, transparent pricing on 1 and 2 pair eyeglass packages. The pricing is fair and easy to understand. No up-selling or pressure to buy like at the national optical retailers.

As for the doctor being rude, please give me the pleasure of actually meeting you in person, before forming your opinions.

Regards,
Dr. V.
Owner/President AFO1H

name: Amber Fleming
text: I went as a new patient today. This office definitely has it together. The front desk staff were friendly, the office was clean, and the doctor and his assistants were fantastic! I never felt rushed. Highly recommend! Thank you Dr. Griffin & staff for a great 1st visit!

name: Amy B
text: Absolutely LOVED this facility and it's staff. My husband and I took our 4 oldest children in to get eye exams and new glasses. The staff treated us so nicely!  I filled out all the paperwork prior to our appointment and loved having that option when it comes to all of our kiddos being present. My husband went back with all of our children to see Dr Albert while I waited in the lobby with our baby. Upon completion of the exams, they were kind enough to offer recaps on all of my children so that I was up to speed. All four children had to pick out frames and the staff was SO patient and informative with any questions we had. A huge change from the last optometrist office we had in town. Our last office rushed myself and my children and since we have amazing coverage,  pointed us in the direction of frames that were the most expensive instead of helping us look for more kid friendly and durable options. Total game changer with Dothan Optometric Clinic. We were so pleased, my husband and I have already set up our appointments for ourselves and will take all of our children to them from here on out for all their vision needs. I am always nervous trying new doctors and changing locations for care, but this is one that I'm so glad we took that leap. I only wish we had chose these doctors sooner! Thank you Dothan Optometric Clinic for treating our family so kindly! We will definitely be seeing y'all again in our future.

name: Aurienta Douglas

name: Jim Tadlock
text:
We see Doctor Griffin and feel well cared for by him and his team. We highly recommend them.

They are punctual, we've never had to wait more than five minutes; they don’t push their glasses or contacts, you can take your prescription anywhere you like to get it filled...but I have found their prices are not much different from others, even the online services.

While I like saving money as much as the rest of the country, there is something to be said for patronizing our local service providers so they can stay in business and be there when we need them.

It's not cheap setting up a medical facility and I'm not suggesting we don’t mind our expenses but if we don’t take care of them, they won't be there to take care of us.

With that in mind, we try to support our local providers.

They took photos of inside my eye and ran a scan to compare my optic nerves. Charged me for just the exam, but did so much more. I wish I lived down here just to keep him as my regular optometrist. If you want an affordable visit with new age technology and a Doctor who is very passionate about the health of your eyes, go here.

name: Gary A. Swatzell
text:
Comfortable. Not a word used frequently to describe an eye glass store. But comfortable is how I felt while entering Eyemart Express #184 on Cahaba Park Circle. All of the staff were kind, funny and accommodating; especially, Kirk! A brilliant lens technician that knows everything about progressive lenses. For example: I’ve never been able to read books with progressives. The peak progression is so for down making it impossible to fix ones eyes continuously. Kirk suggested a “short progressive” that allows one to focus on the peak 4mm sooner with a much larger window. After purchasing, the change is incredible.

But the big story is: I took Kirk a pair of rimless glasses that I had stepped on back in 2005. They were my favorites and I was nostalgic for them. Kirk didn’t hesitate, he immediately started the logistical process, built the glasses, and a couple of days later: I was looking through short progressive rimless glasses exactly like the ones I stepped on.

But the bigger story is: I’m used to paying around $700 for everything. I was out of the store for less than $275.

I’m a retired engineer and I highly recommend Eyemart Express.

text: Amazing place, I definitely recommend coming here. They're super nice! The GM and everyone else went above and beyond, and were super helpful.  Best service I've experienced at an eye place.

text: I visited there yesterday with my daughter. We were greeted as we walked in the door. We only waited about 10 minutes. We had to stand while waiting due to Covid rules there was only one chair. They have a huge selection including designer brands. We were treated so good. I wish I had gotten the lady’s name who helped us. She sat at the very front table/computer. She was very professional and helpful. She made us feel comfortable and at home. We got both pair of glasses made in less than an hour! This is an awesome service since in the town where we live it takes over a week to get glasses made. We couldn’t wait that long. She had a game in 2 days. Besides who wants to wait that long when you need new glasses now? We will definitely shop there again and I will recommend them to everyone I know who needs glasses. By the way, I am using my sons google account to leave this review hence the male user name above.

name: James Hayward
text: I moved from Dothan, Al. I had to find a new Optometrist and a glasses store that provided in house manufacture of the prescription.  This is it!!  Although the wonderful Doctor of Optometry, Dr. Wright and Eyemart Express are connected through a door, they disavow any real business connection with each other; however, if there is a problem with the prescription, I'm sure the two entities would collaborate and arrive at a meaningful conclusion to the benefit of the patient.  I went here and had the most thorough, high tech analysis of my optical needs form Dr. Wright.  She is friendly, professional and knowledgeable. Then I took my prescription through the joining door and gave it to Matthew in Eyemart Express.  He was great...knowledgeable and professionally measured my eye distance, got my insurance payouts, suggested the type of 'glass' and tint I could have and their advantages.  Most glasses can be done inhouse and ready that day, but mine needed a week.   I am very happy I lucked out and found this place online.

The story continues.....  An hour after leaving Eyemart Express, my dad fell and broke his brand new glasses.  Needless to say, we were back in the store and the warranty completely replaced his frames and lens at no charge.  Plus it was done within 20 minutes.

name: AKA NOXIOUS
text: The customer service I received here was above and beyond any eye center I have visited. I was greeted with a friendly smile and I was immediately provided a warm welcome.  I bought two pair of glasses for the price of one.  I will definitely shop here in the future. If you are shopping for glasses and would like to save, please checkout Eyemart. I promise, you will be happy that you did.

name: Crystal Johnson
text:
I had great service for my eye exam and getting my glasses! I needed to be seen quickly and they got me an appointment same day and I left with 2 new pair of glasses an hour later.
Everyone was very friendly and helpful!

name: HeyImKelly AJ
text:
GREAT experience at Eyemart Express - glasses ready in 72 minutes!!

My 10-year-old had her first pair of prescription glasses exactly one week before she lost them at school. The original glasses were from a different eye clinic and we had waited nearly two weeks for them after getting the Rx and choosing frames.

I didn’t want her to have to go another two weeks without clear vision, so I did a web search for “same day glasses”. Eyemart Express popped up in the results, with a very convenient location right on our route between home and school.

I had the Rx faxed to Eyemart Express and we stopped by after school. There was a nice variety of youth frames and my daughter quickly found exactly what she wanted with the assistance of the friendly, knowledgeable associate. I decided to buy two pairs so we would have a backup - just in case. Once the frames were selected, it took a mere 72 minutes for the in-house lab to make the glasses.

Eyemart Express was able to replace my daughter’s glasses in less than two hours from start to finish, including choosing the frames, making the glasses,  and carefully adjusting them for a comfortable, secure fit.

Total cost for two pairs of youth glasses with single vision, impact-resistant polycarbonate lenses, scratch resistant coating and clear UV protection was lass than $185.00.

I’m very pleased with our experience at Eyemart Express and I definitely recommend them to anyone.

name: Anne Wynn
text: The man working there did a great job of tightening up my glasses, and told how I could tighten them back up myself. And he gave me some great tips for maintaining the frames so they will last longer. Great customer service!

name: Nikki E
text: The optometrist, Dr. Barbara Wright, is excellent! Exam was just $69 and extremely thorough. She's professional, capable and super nice. On the frames side, the prices are SO much more reasonable than other places. Justin (the GM) and Hunter are perfectly helpful and very personable. The only snafu was one of their machines was down so my glasses weren't ready until the next day, but I believe that was a rare occurrence. This is my new vision place! Definitely recommend!

name: Meighan Pilleteri
text: HIGHLY recommend going here for glasses, eye exam or both. I needed an eye exam and new glasses and didn't want to wait several weeks for them. I was skeptical at first, but the optometrist got my vision to a point of clarity I've never gotten with other doctors. I got my glasses in 36 minutes and by the end of the day I could see much more clearly. I will definitely be back. The glasses are SUPER affordable, huge selection of them and the staff was amazing.

resp.text: Hello Meighan, thank you so much for taking the time to rate and review your local Eyemart Express store. We are very pleased to know that you were satisfied with your most recent experience! We appreciate your business, and we look forward to assisting you in the future. Thank you, Sahaad – Eyemart Express Customer Care Team

resp.text:
Hi Larry! Thank you for your feedback. Sorry we were not able to produce your glasses the same day. We do make over 90% the same day but some prescriptions and coatings require a special order. We understand that sometimes prescriptions may take a little tweaking and invite you back in at your convenience so we can take a look and help make your vision better. Please do not hesitate to contact us in customer service if we can help. Thank you! Mary, Eyemart Express Customer Care
Dallas, TX 888-372-2763

name: David Wright
text: Dr. Clark made a terrible decision to sale to My Eye Dr.  For many years this was a great office for eye exams. Great doctors and great staff. Not now though. Not a pleasant experience at all. I would advise anyone going to this office to proceed with caution.

resp.text:
Hi David,

Thank you for the feedback, I am so sorry for your experience and that you were placed on hold for that long. Our goal is to never exceed a 30 second hold time, I apologize that was not the case for you.
Your records are your property and you should never be met with resistance to obtain those.
I would love to speak with you about this, please send your contact info to myeyedr.com/patientrelations so we can call you.
Warm regards,
Patient Relations

name: Car Dog
text: Just want to give a big shout out to this office and Lee in particular. She helped me in a dire situation when I was completely out of contacts. I had originally spoken to the Hoover office who ordered some for me but didn't have any I could get right away. When I asked the girl on the phone if she could check around, she said I would need to call around to each office on my own. So I called the Pelham office and Lee made sure I was able to get lenses that day, and told me what the Hoover office told me was not the correct policy and they are always supposed to call around on behalf of their patients. She really went above and beyond when the other office kinda left me feeling out in the cold. As someone who works in sales, I really appreciate when someone really works hard to help me. Thank you so much Lee!!!

resp.text:
Hello,
We are proud to have been able to assist with your vision care needs in our Pelham Parkway, AL office. Here at MyEyeDr, we strive to provide products in a timely manner, all while maintaining quality patient service. Lee is commended for the willingness to go above and beyond for our valued patients. We can't wait to share your feedback with the entire team. Thank you for choosing MyEyeDr to guide your vision care journey. We look forward to seeing you again soon!
Best regards.

name: Alfred Pickett
text: My eye appointment was fine, my insurance didn’t cover frames this year so I opted to bring in my Oakley frames 3 weeks ago to have new lenses put in. I called Monday talked to someone about my glasses and was told they would call me back well it’s Been 4 days no call left messages the last 3 days now because no one will answer the phone or even return me messages.  I want answers on where my glasses are please !!!!!!

resp.text:
Hello Alfred,

We are extremely apologetic that you were not able to have your eyeglasses in a timely manner. We understand how important it is to have working eyeglasses. Our goal is to provide total patient satisfaction and experience. Please reach out to us directly at myeyedr.com/patientrelations, so we can resolve this. Best Regards

name: glover pope
text: I used the clinic for almost 15 years. When My Eye Care took over, they became disorganized and inefficient with both my vision care as well as my husband’s vision care.  Last year, they called me at work asking where my husband was. I was panicked...I knew he was in their office...I was thinking the worst.  They confused their records. He was in a room seeing one of their doctors while calling me to ask why he left the waiting room.  Today, they told me I had to see a new doctor because mine no longer worked there.  That is fine.  The new doctor wouldn’t give me a particular test that I am required to have  and HAVE had for the last 15 years. It was the reason for the appointment.   They also tried to tell me I had not been there since 2004. I’ve been there every year sometimes multiple times per year for the last 15 years. When I asked where Dr. Williams went, they refused to tell me.  There is more but I do not wish to post personal medical issues here.

resp.text: Thank you for your feedback Glover, we are disappointed to hear about the encounter you have described. Our goal is to make every visit with us a great experience. Our Patient Relations Department would like the opportunity to speak with you to get more information on your experience.  At your leisure, please reach out to us directly at myeyedr.com/patientrelations. We look forward to speaking with you soon.

name: Sherita Garcia
text: I called on August 12th and made an appointment with the call center who actually scheduled me for August 6th, 2020 instead of August 13th 2020. After getting there and waiting a few minutes, a rep came out, got me and directed me to the front desk where another young lady was able to find out what happened. She explained the call center made a mistake in scheduling me and advised I could see another doctor, but it wouldn't be for another hour or so. Initially I started to cancel the appointment altogether, but I decided to take it since I had already taken off work. I came back at the advised time and I am so glad I did. The tech assisting Dr. Perry was very informative, kind, and answered all of my questions. Dr. Perry was just the same. I felt at ease and was able to ask questions and receive very detailed answers from him. After my exam, the optician Sescily was very helpful with explaining my insurance coverages as well as very hands on while letting me try on frame after frame. I felt like I was important from the beginning of the appointment to the very end. The office is very clean and COVID-19 measures were taken with every single person (including myself) coming in and out of office. I thoroughly enjoyed my experience and I cannot wait to get my new glasses I purchased! I only gave 4 stars because if the mix up with the appointment time. The staff definitely made up for the mix up.

resp.text: Hello Sherita, while we regret to learn of the scheduling mix-up that you experienced, we are truly proud that our Pelham Parkway, AL team were able to provide the quality service that we strive for. Here at MyEyeDr we are always willing to go above and beyond for our valued patients. We will be sure to share your kind feedback with our entire team. We appreciate your time in sharing your experience with us. We look forward to ameliorating your visit in the near future. Best regards.
