name: Reese Booth
text:
Doctor Lowe is the only bright light at the clinic. She is professional and you can tell that she cares for her patients. I am torn because although she is great, the rest of the staff that, I have had the displeasure of seeing, make me not want to return.

When this was a Schaefer Eye Center, the staff was fantastic. The doctors were personable and I looked forward to my visits.

Now is a different story. I am asked the same questions that I have answered numerous times in this last month. If the notes are in my chart, why can't the tech realize which eye I just had surgery on. 3 visits in a row now I have been ask that same question by the same Tech that will not look in the chart to find the answer.

Now this may just be picky but why is it that my eye doctor forces you to put on an open  paper mask. granted I understand it's Covid but when you come in the door instead of allowing you to continue to wear your own cloth mask which is thicker and better. Not only is it a waste of resources there's no way it is more sanitary than my own that I wash constantly. They refused to even talk to you or see you until you put their paper mask on so I put it on top of my cloth mask each time.

The front desk staff has been friendly but I have not had a lot of interaction with them and I'm not sure that I really want to go back. It is an absolute shame that the rest of the practice doesn't live up to the same standards as Doctor Lowe.

resp.text:
Hi Mr. Booth,
We're sorry to hear your recent experience did not meet your expectations.  We appreciate you taking the time to speak with us today in order to address your concerns.  Please know that MyEyeDr is committed to ensuring all our patients and staff are as safe as possible during not just during these current times, if proper COVID precautionary measures are not being taken, it will be most certainly be addressed.  Thank you for allowing us the opportunity to begin regaining your trust to ensure your personalize vision wellness is our top priority.
Kind regards,
Patient Relations

Warm Regards, Patient Relations

name: Colby Radenz
text: Where do I begin?  The doctors have zero personality and make you feel like it’s a rushed appointment.  That may have been okay had anything else gone well.  My husband and payed for our glasses with our FSA card, which they have signs everywhere asking about it.  Checking out took almost an hour!  The front desk people couldn’t even tell me what astigmatism was.  My husband didn’t end up liking his glasses and it was a complete hassle to get them to refund it back to our same FSA card.  The office manager, Shannon, was not exactly wanting to help until I forced the issue.  My lenses weren’t correct so I had to make, yet, another appointment to examine again since there was no doctor there.    I go to that appointment and they adjust the rx.  Luckily, the ONLY pleasant and HELPFUL person that works there, Kim, had me try sample lenses with the new rx BEFORE they sent it to the lab......only to find out the new rx wasn’t right either.  She wanted to let me see/speak with the doctor about it but he had gone to lunch.  At this point, after going there 3 times and now having to go back AGAIN, I will be returning my glasses as well.  Going to start fresh somewhere else!

resp.text: Colby,  We value your feedback and would like very much to speak with you in hopes to rectify your experience and provide you with the Valued Patient Care that you deserve.  Our goal is to make every visit with us a great experience.  Please contact us directly at myeyedr.com/patientrelations to discuss further your feedback and to grant us the opportunity to win your business. We look forward to speaking with you soon.

name: Dayle Goodwin
text: All I can say is chaotic.  I am sure at one time this was an organized facility.

resp.text: We would like to get some more details about your experience and make sure this gets resolved. We will try to reach out to you, to resolve this situation.  In the meantime, please send me your contact information here,  myeyedr.com/patientrelations

name: Jonathan Hunt
text: Today is sadly the last day i will visit Schaeffer after many years. I had an appointment and was running slightly late, so i called ahead and let them know. They only thing the receptionist said, in a kinda rude way, was that i would have to reschedule for another day if i was 1 min past 15 min late. So i drive like crazy to get there and made it on time! Except i accidentally parked in the optometrist lot next door. After I go in and realize i am supposed to be next door it is of course 1 min past the 15 min late. I was turned away and told i could not be seen. The waiting room was literally empty. I then walked back next door and they were able to see me on the spot and i had a great experience. Do yourself a favor and skip Schaeffer and go next door like i did. You will be happier

resp.text: Jonathan, we sincerely apologize for your experience regarding your scheduled appointment yesterday. Your experience is not how we intend to serve our patients and we regret that we fell short of our expectations of care. We did leave you a voicemail so that we could further discuss this with you. Even though we cannot alleviate the frustration you have endured thus far, please let us know is there is anything we can do that will afford us another opportunity to serve your vision correction needs. Take Care.

name: Regina Martin
text: I went for my first eye exam ever yesterday and had the BEST time. Dawn, who I think *?* is the office manager, took so much time helping me find the perfect frames-it was a blast and she was genuinely interested in helping me find something I'd love. (And I did-SUCCESS!) The Dr. and assistant were both great. SUCH a positive experience and so glad I chose to go with them.

name: Cat
text: Went in for a emergency and had never been there before. They we are great, sweet and to the point. The only thing with out having a appointment the wait was a little long. The doctor was great and to the point and very helpful.

name: Leslie Bates
text: Beautiful, clean building! Nice & helpful staff! Dawn is an extremely wonderful asset to this place!

name: M A
text:
The staff is friendly, but the most helpful is ( Dawn ) the most amazing manager, solved my problem in a second !
Most respectful manager in this office
All my respect 👍🏻

name: Michelle Cook
text:
I wish I could give more than a 5 star rating...

Schaeffer Eye Center in Trussville, AL is the BEST bar none! The ladies in this office are fantastic. The Doctors are phenomenal. Every staff member is always polite, and the place always clean. I have a 5 year old, he is hyper active, and borderline Autistic. He was not yet able to identify letters properly, but he could do shapes. The nurse, Katelin, who was working with him took her time and found a chart, and walked him through the steps. He never cried, he never fussed, and he told me later he loved eye exam.

name: Sharon Rosenow
text: Went in to get my first contact lense fitting done! The Dr was super nice and interactive. The assistant was quite pleasant and explain all my cost options with my insurance. Whole process took just over an hour and I walked out glasses free! My husband has been going here for awhile now and I doubly recommend them to anyone (and those like me who are nerved by eye doctors!)

name: james montoya
text: Amazing costumer service. This lady I think was her name was Dawn, was patient with the whole family and made our experience a real treat! I will always go to her for the rest of my life. She is that awesome.

name: Rachael Winston
text: Wonderful customer service!!  I love my glasses that I got as well. Dawn and Samantha rock. The physician was thorough and nice. I highly recommend this office!

name: Kathy Bessiere
text: Just had a very bad experience.  I pre-scheduled a Saturday appointment a year ago so that I could make sure to get a Saturday appointment.  They called me today to cancel because the doctor was not going to work that day.  Then they told me that I would have to wait until May for another Saturday appointment time.  Way to make your customers feel important.

resp.text: We apologize for the delayed response. Kathy, we regret that your Saturday appointment was cancelled at no fault of yours, and will use this as an opportunity to improve. We can be contacted directly at PatientRelations@myeyedr.com.

name: Sarah Wilson
text: Excellent service! Love my glasses!

resp.text: I love this review, Sarah!  It gives us motivation and helps ensure we all provide high-quality care.  Thanks so much for sharing. We look forward to helping out again in the future.

name: Marci Lewkutz
text: I have been with schaeffer eye in trussville for 3 years and the staff is so polite and I have never had a problem in fact this weekend I encountered a injury to my eye due to my contact and called then on Saturday morning and they told me to come right in and we will look at your eye after treatment I was pleased with the results and the doctor Swain that seen me seen me explained everything that I had to do and told me if it gets any worse they have a eye clinic in birghman  until my follow-up

name: Perla Lopez
text: Love everyone there, so sweet They care about you and your needs!

name: Tahirah Walker
text: Great customer service!

name: Henry Robertson
text: When my daughter broke her glasses, they were able to put her lenses in a new frame and it only cost me $18 total.  Outstanding!

name: Tara Johnson
text: Great customer service and friendly associates!!!

name: Leslie Finley
text: WOW!!!  I was expecting a nightmare coming for an eye test with a 2 year old.  But the ladies at the vision center were so nice and helpful.  The entire staff was friendly but professional .  They were so nice that my Grandson, Lucas was a perfect angel.

name: Jennifer DeGaris
text: My son has had great service there.  They are kind and helpful.

name: Tiffany
text: Very friendly staff and and quick service! Great eyewear selection

name: Janet Green
text: I have to say that the ladies that work in the vision center are great.  They are very nice and very helpful.  I came in there with my prescription in hand to purchase a pair of sun glasses there.  First of all, I went in on Friday and was told that I would get a call when they were ready, probably 1 week. However, I got a call the following Monday, that they were already done.  I have went in to get adjustments on the temples, and they have been so wonderful each time, eager to get the best fit. My sunglasses were about 1/3 of the price that I was quoted from a doctors office in town.  I plan to go back there for my next pair.

name: micah nash
text: All of the ladies here do a fantastic job!  It's enjoyable every time I go.

name: Karen Caldwell-Naylor
text: I love the doctor at the vision center but she doesn't seem to keep a very close watch on the girls she hires. More times than not, they are late or not caring to answer the phones when they are there. It gets very frustrating and it makes you wonder just how much business they are losing because of it.

name: Gail Chambers
text: I have gotten excellent service from a wonderful staff at this Pearle Vision for the past 4 years.  I would highly recommend them to anyone needing any type of service for their eyes whether it  be an eye check up or buying new new frames or even just an adjustment for you eyeglasses, you'll find it all here and walk out happy.

name: Gary Hazelton
text: Excellent support converting from bi-focals to progressive lenses. Good crew to work with!

name: Wendell B
text: I had a great experience Tara was exceptional she made the vist a pleasure

name: Joy Sullivan
text:
They refused to see me because I couldn’t wear a Halloween mask due to me being a asthmatic.
Exceptions could have been made.

name: Scott Jones
text: Friendly staff, was able to get in and out relatively quickly, would recommend.

name: Jeremy (Momsboy32)
text: This place has that small town eye place feel. The people are all great. The Dr. Chambers is very pleasant and she loves sci-fi, which is always a great thing. They have a really great frame selection. The wait time was very short for me to get my new glasses. Once they came in they made sure everything was great my my new glasses. I feel like I got an exceptional deal with great service.

name: samantha pearson
text: Dr. Chambers is amazing! Katy was also very nice and helpful with finding the perfect glasses for my style. I absolutely love them! Great job all around!

name: Maggie Granger
text: I’ve always been a contacts person, but my experience with PearleVision has converted me!   The staff was knowledgeable and helpful, and they found the perfect frames for me.  I’m complimented on them all the time.  My contacts have become my backups.  I will definitely be back!

name: Ceasar Carnes
text: I saw Dr. Chambers and have to say it was the fastest eye exam I have ever experienced.  She was in a hurry from the second she entered the exam room.  I was taken aback at her abrupt dismissal of me when I had questions.  As I continued the process of choosing frames, etc. I observed how the patients were being pushed through quickly.  I don't think this type of office is for me.

name: thomas elliot
text: I came in for an exam this morning and had a wonderful experience. Dr Chambers was helpful and informative and Jason found a great pair of glasses for me. couldnt be happier.

name: Chelsea Winborne
text: I love Dr. Chambers and Dr.Matalka! (I have not yet met Dr. Mallard, but I am sure they are lovely as well.) They are both very sweet and knowledgeable. I moved to Minor, AL and I still travel to be here.

name: erin price
text: I couldn't find the frames I wanted at my doctor. They had an amazing selection my new glasses are beautiful. Thanks Pearle!

name: Donald Matheson
text: I had a very nice check up with Dr Chambers and love the new glasses!

name: Malia Bunt
text: I've lived in a few different cities and been through several different optometrists. These guys run a tight ship. They are professional and friendly. I had tried to wear contacts before but, it never worked. My eyes would get too dry or I would waste them. The doctors at Pearle Vision took the time to find a pair of contacts that work with my eyes and for that, I'm eternally grateful.

name: Mike Carrasco
text: Dr.Chamber was awesome and really wonderful.First time walk in and was greeted by friendly staff.

name: william wesson
text: Awful customer service.  My husband went in to get a copy of his prescription and they refused to give him a copy....the young lady was very rude about it...including ripping out the prescription and throwing into the trash in front of him.  I am waiting on a response from corporate on this matter.

name: ShaQuira Nichols
text: My experience was WONDERFUL! Dr. Jane Wright was AWESOME, she took her time and explained everything she was doing and was needless to say a great person who i STRONGLY recommend. Tanasia was my optician and she’s was the SWEETEST with a great sense of humor my overall experience was GREAT I loved ALL the staff ...

name: Hensley Lindley
text: In & out super quick. Optometrist was straight to the point which I loved!! I’ll be back. :)

name: Hondahaney
text: Good prices, Marx optical was $200 more for the same glasses.

name: LexCee Howlet
text: Jane Wright was EXTREMELY rude and disrespectful with ZERO patience. I WILL NEVER go back!

name: Madison Deal
text: Please save yourself the stress and choose a different doctor! This place is horrible. I was told I did my exam wrong! I did it wrong!? What. And then I was treated rudely because I told them the contacts they had me put in were giving me a headache because it was obviously the wrong prescription. They then wouldn’t check me out after I told them I was done and just wanted my prescription and to be on my way. The woman answered phones and played on the computer and had me wait even longer because she found it funny. She even said “I’m sorry you are having such a bad day” to help further my frustration and to provoke me. Then after leaving I realized they didn’t even fill out my prescription correctly and I had to go back and deal with them an hour longer! Just do not do it. Go somewhere else.

name: Charles Miller
text: In an out without a problem noice!

name: Phadra29 Strong
text: Worst experience in the world, I definitely will not be going back! Now I see why the rating is a 2. Do not waste your time or money!!!

name: Susan Berryhill
text: I have been going to the optical center at Wal-Mart for over 2 yrs now & love it!! The DR. is extremely knowledgeable, courteous & professional! Steve is excellent at his job & his level of customer service is impeccable ! The prices are very reasonable!

name: Judy Jones
text: Wow- 2 .3 stars and I Totally understand why! I had an appointment for the Day we were expecting Snow, I recieved a call on the day before canceling due to predicted weather- Understandable... I asked to buy 1 contact for my right eye and was told no, my prescription had expired- I have had problems with my right eye (which they knew). Rather than sell me one contact after THEY cancelled my appointment their choice for me would have been to wear a bad contact. Needless to say I chose another Doctor who took care of me that day very well!

name: David Shaw II
text:
In early October, my wife and I set up an appointment through Eve (Vision Center Manager) for early November. We saw her write the appointment down--both in the book and on a business card--and we left. We arrived on the morning of the appointment and we were told by Eve that I did not have an appointment and that the doctor would not be able to see me today. My wife told them that we had made the appointment a month ago, and I pulled the card out of my wallet. I was able to see the doctor--though they double-booked her--at my appointment time.

Both of our interactions with Eve felt strained. She seemed more interested in telling us about HER experiences with her vision loss rather than listening to our concerns and answering our questions. My wife had to steer her back to the intended topic several times.

The doctor was very thorough and enlightened me on my Visual Impairment and the probable cause behind it. She was the first doctor to connect my VI with any probable cause, despite the fact I was born with the disability. I feel the doctor is extremely competent in her field and would recommend her to anyone. The manager, however, needs to be replaced.

name: ibpoor
text: Cannot buy glasses at this place because it is closed. And employee with an attitude.

name: Kayla Terry
text: I called to ask how much an appointment was. I was told a certain price, and when I was finished with my exam I was charged something different. I told them about what I was told and then told he couldn't do anything but talk to the person about it. Then when checking prices for contacts, he got kind of rude with me because I wanted to check a website. Told me I wouldn't find them anywhere cheaper and if I didn't buy them there I couldn't get the rebate. After leaving I checked out line and the prices were cheaper than if I would have bought them there and got the rebate. The doctor was nice and professional, but did not look into something specifically about my eye health that I asked her to. Other than that she was good. I don't recommend going here.

name: Dani Corum
text: Doesn't even deserve one star! Went to get contacts and glasses and the lady who was fitting me for glasses was very rude. She was treating me like a child and getting frustrated with me because i couldn't keep my eyes perfectly still for her. She kept snapping at me to be still and getting very rude with me. After a while of this I went off on her. I asked for a different person and waited for the next person available. This person was much nicer but when I asked for the lady's name so that I can call management and complain he said he was the manager. I was shocked that the manager was sitting next to us the entire time and not once chastised her for the way she was acting. I requested her name again and he would not give it to me. When I went back to get my glasses a week later I got the "manager" again and when trying on my glasses I mentioned it made me feel motion sick the way they were looking when I moved my head and he got smart with me telling me to be realistic... The eye doctor was very nice though. No complaints with her but everyone else was horrible. I will not be going back. I will take my prescription somewhere else.

name: Mila Angel
text: I never back here anymore !

name: alicat asmr
text: It is amazing and I love their glasses. They are super cute.and I love the cases. The people that work their are super nice. You can also get contacts.

name: Leah Hughes
text: Great staff. Fast service.

name: Johnny Schultz
text: 5/9/2018 I stopped into the Decatur, AL Vision Center after making a store purchase to have my pupil distance (PD) measured. The center was empty with a young gal behind the counter and a young man with rubber boots sitting on the floor talking. I asked if I could get my measured as I wanted to compare pricing online with the Vision Center. I was told she could not do it as it is people with prescriptions only. Yup I should have known since it is Walmart which equates to poorest customer service.

name: LAN K
text: I went for contacts and glasses a 2018, glasses are so bad I can’t read very well and contacts tear easily, I feel totally unbalanced when walking wearing the glasses, I told the guy that helped me when I picked up my glasses that they weren’t right,, he said my eyes would adjust to them,, well it’s been several months now and I am still having the same problem,, I will never use this place again,!!!!!

name: Kate Rodgers
text: The staff is friendly and helpful!

name: Lance Flood
text: I was initially seen a few years ago, paid for my exam, and was told that since my diabetes was not under control they couldn't help me.  I was not given a refund but simply told to return once my numbers were under control.  I finally returned today after a long struggle and experiments with everything from daily Lantus to weekly Bydureon.  I was told that since it's been over a year, I would have to pay again.  What?  That isn't what I was told.  I didn't receive the service I paid for.  Either refund my money, or sit me back in the exam chair with the eye doctor who reeks like cigarette smoke.  Nevertheless, I was given neither option.  I will never use this place again.  Granted, it was "only" $50.00, but the principle remains that they received $50.00 and failed to deliver their service, nor was I informed of an expiration policy.  Shady.

name: Derek Beaty
text: I'll give 2 stars just because it was decent at one point. Wouldn't recommend it now with Stig in charge.

name: Joseph Ridenhour
text: I got a frame that my wife hated.  Uh oh.  Went back in the next business day, and the gentleman there was very helpful in pointing out a pair of frames that was similar in style to my old Timberland frames, but with extra viewing area and thinner and lighter titanium than the old pair!  So yeah... get the insurance for your frames, just in case.... and make sure to get your anti-reflective coating.  It's not a filter... it's an anti-filter to stop glare and allow most of the light to pass through lens instead of glancing off.  So the lens doesn't look like clear plastic, and so you don't see your eyeballs in your lens.

name: kenneth williams
text: My wife and I had appointments together here on the same day. The doctor was nice. But the Assistant Manager named Eve was very rude. She really needs to listen to her customers instead of having her stinking attitude. She really has no respect for customers nor does she have customer service skills. She really should be fired and should respect all customers not just men.

name: Jennifer Hill
text: The absolute worst customer service in ANY medical field that I have ever experienced. Very Poor management. Eve has a problem actually LISTENING to the any customer. She seems to just want to assert her attitude and her "authority" instead of actually solving any problems for the CUSTOMER! It appears she gets a real kick out of arguing and should not be in the customer service business. They ordered the wrong contacts and instead of listening to the problem Eve threatened to throw the wrong ones away if I did not pick them up without offering to resolve anything. I'm appalled and frustrated by the entire experience.

name: Vermonica Buckelew
text: After trying three different times to get appt I actually made one for today at 12:15, arrived 10 minutes early and after waiting a bit the manager comes out to tell they would have to do only part of my exam today and come back at a later date because since the appt was later in the day it would go into the doctors lunch time. I work at a veterinarian clinic and when we make appt, even if it goes into the doctors lunch time, we finish the appt. I even arrived early so it was by no means my fault if they scheduled an appt wrong. I would recommend not wasting your time here.

name: Stacy Newsom
text: Good

name: Gerald. Lynn Bradley
text: Been 7 days .Are my glasses in ?

name: Dranald Crawper
text: They offer rebates but try to say there is something wrong with your submission. I have submitted what they asked for withe the exact information they wanted for rebate 4 times and they are still saying they didn’t get it. I submitted it through their website and emailed it. I don’t recommend buying from this company because they offer a rebate. That’s one rebate you may never get.

name: David Plunkett
text:
I live in Anniston and had had enough of America’s Best. This place was highly recommended by a friend. Let me tell you it was worth the drive! I was in and out within 30 minutes. The doctor was very friendly, professional and knowledgeable. The atmosphere was clean and CALM...also very different from America’s Best which has been a nightmare the last few years.
They gave me a great discount since I didn’t have insurance....better than America’s Best prices even! I will definitely be going back.

name: J316
text: Dr. Cooper is nice but staff was a little different to deal with and not very helpful. I started going to Gadsden Eye Associates and then realized how much Dr Cooper was not checking or doing as well as his lack of more modern equipment. Don’t mean to be negative just factual.

name: JSU Fan 80
text: Excellent service.. Quality Care.. They take VSP insurance & Vision Choice Insurance (AEA)

name: Summer Gonzales
text: Rude staff when making appointments screams at you on the phone then harasses you for not wanting to there

name: Chase Pearson
text: Awesome service with a smile and a joke!

name: Haley Lee
text: Dr. McCurdy and staff are always so nice! They really seem to care about you.

name: John Stillman
text: Kate is a great doctor; she explains issues well and has a very straight forward demeanor.

name: Sharron Albright
text: I have always been pleased with the staff and assistance I have received.  I am sad Dr. Nichols is working toward retirement.  But I will continue to use Clinic for Vision if I can.

name: Vann Scott
text: The staff is always super professional and caring.  Dr. Tim Nichols is one of the best.

name: Bonita Hubble
text: Great staff. Everyone is professional and friendly. Would recommend to anyone who asked me where to go for their vision checkups/problems.

name: Tyler Walls
text: Awesome place. They were genuinely concerned and each member of the staff gave me confidence that they would do all in their power to ensure my eye was taken care of.

name: Mandy Duvall (K&G Metals)
text: Wonderful place with wonderful people. Very clean and they care about your eyes!! The entire staff is professional and kind.

name: Benson Properties
text: Clean and safe, very friendly and helpful staff.  Been seeing Dr. Kate McCurdy for years. Love her!  My vision has improved since being under her care.

name: Marilyn Lane
text: My husband had an issue with the prescription on his glasses he got in September and it was immediately dealt with successfully.

name: Brenda Stansell
text: The people that work at Vision PC are the best.  No long waits and very concerned for your eyesight.  I would highly recommend you go see them

name: Serena Vinci
text: Great office. The staff was professional and the exam was thorough but not too invasive. I recommend this place to everyone from kids to adults.

name: Thea Lee
text: Fast with little wait...doctor and assistants were knowledgeable, helpful, and friendly...facility was clean and pleasant atmosphere...location was easy to find.

name: Brittany Wise
text: I have been taking my daughter there since she was 4 and she is now she is 7. I will never take her anywhere else. The staff is very nice and professional. Thank you to the staff for everything yall have done for my daughter

name: Johnny Jones
text: Very friendly and seemingly competent staff.

name: Richard Langston
text: Always friendly starting at the front door reception. Technology and equipment is impressive. The whole crew is helpful and ready with answers. Dr. Nichols has helped me through some issues with my eyes. I trust him to take care of my needs.

name: Kathy Jones
text: Very in depth and complete.

name: Kenneth Moore
text: Dr. Kate McCurdy is a awesome optometrist nice and friendly staff clean facilities also.

name: Chris Droke
text: I was in town for the Bassmaster Classic and sat on my glasses. I went here because of the 5 star rating. They were SUPER nice and repaired my glasses at no charge!! In and out in 5 minutes. Amazing people to help me out when I’m five hours from home!

name: K. Moore
text: Not only does Dr. Nichols do a wonderful job but all the staff is so personable! I always enjoy my appointment! The contemporary Christian music playing is def a plus too! 🤓 I referred my mother to Dr. Nichols and she feels the same!

name: Tammy Beck
text: The staff is always friendly and ready to help.

name: Tiffany Ferrari
text: Amazing care for my child over a holiday weekend. The Drs there are great!!

name: janice ross
text: Always great and friendly treatment

name: Terry Kuzmic
text: friendly, knowledgeable and professional

name: Howard Beason
text: I love this place, I highly recommend Dr. Nichols! They will answer all your eye questions. This place is great!

name: Laurel Anderson
text: I have seen Dr. Nichols for about 15 years now! He is great and very friendly! The office staff is always wonderful and ready to help with anything I need!

name: Whittany Nicholas
text: They were so kind and quick at getting my family in as new customers. Dr. McCurdy was very thorough with the exams. Thanks for a great experience.

name: Bob Amburn
text: Wonderful doctors. Wonderful staff. The care received at Clinic for Vision has enabled me to go from nearly nothing to practically everything. Excellent results through excellent care.

name: Corey Brooks
text:
I had never been in the office and had a horrible eye infection that turned out to be pink eye. They took my information, saw me immediately and helped me out, within hours I had antibiotics and was pain free!!  They even called me a couple days later to check on me!!  I can't explain what a relief it was to be helped so quickly and efficiently with the lack of customer service you feel at places these days.  I highly recommend the Dr as she was completely thorough and amazing in treating my eye!!
Went back for a follow up a week later and such improvement was made in my eyes they were able to do an exam so I could obtain contacts, hooked me up with lots of free samples and rebate offers on contacts and solution.

name: Carrie Maeger
text: I saw Dr. Nichols yesterday and he helped me figure out what was going on after some testing. I talked to him today to follow-up. He was very thorough, ans he and his staff were very friendly and helpful! I highly recommend seeing him for your vision needs!

name: Belinda Franks
text: Dr. Nichols and his staff always treat me with respect, professionalism, and courtesy.  I feel very confident entrusting my eye care needs to him and his team.

name: Tony Campbell
text: These folks are terrific. Dr. Nichols is very knowledgeable. My eye situation is complex. He had a good understanding of what I’m up against and made me feel better about my situation. His assistant Charlotte is a hoot. I’d go back just to visit with her. Super nice, smart people here.

name: Doug Murphy
text: Great service. Friendly environment. Dr. Nichols goes the extra mile when it comes to your eyes.

name: Dorthy White
text:
A professional family with one purpose: to serve you and your needs. This is done with great ability and detail. Both minor and major needs are cared for.
Yes, this is the place to go for care.

name: Dillon
text: I've been going here for >20 years and still continue to come here for my exams even after I moved away from Albertville over 10 years ago. Always fast and friendly staff. Dr. Nichols is the best.

name: Ralph Ballew
text: Top notch professional people that really care about you and take all the time needed to explain your problems!!

name: Pamela Harper
text: I LOVE Dr. Nichols!  He’s the absolute best!

name: Violet Davis
text: I was very pleased with the service I received.  Everyone was nice and professional.

name: Jerry Cagle
text: Prompt courteous service- always on time - they care about your eyes

name: Jess Youngblood
text: Absolutely excellent service and professionalism. Office is always clean, and staff are friendly and knowledgeable. The doctors are compassionate and offer exemplary care to all ages. I would highly recommend this office.

name: Alanna Smith
text: All the staff at Clinic for Vision are reputable, friendly and caring. I would recommend any of my family and friends to entrust their vision care here.

name: bobbie gomez
text: Extremely curtious and helpful.

name: Cindy Coolidge
text: I love Dr Nichols and the whole staff. He always explains everything clearly to me and I trust him completely.  The are all very kind and patient people.

name: Brenda Parker
text: Very caring and patient. Not a long wait time from your schedule time visit.  Recommend highly.

name: Elyse
text: Clinic for Vision is the best place I have ever gone to for eye care. The staff is amazing and they take good care of your vision needs.

name: Ken Cleghorn
text: Very friendly and professional. Staff was very nice and friendly. Thanks

name: Jennifer Wilborn
text: Dr. Nichols and his office staff are fabulous. Quick & easy yearly vision appointment. Everyone friendly and efficient. I would highly recommend.

name: Billy and Megan Cox
text: I was here about three years ago amd I will never return. Mr.Dr.McCurdy was very respectful and a very good doctor. My experience with Mrs.Dr.McCurdy, on the other hand was a nightmare. I came in with an eye ulcer and Mr.Dr.McCirdy helped me a lot and asked for a second follow up visit to see how my eye was feeling. When I returned I did not seem him. I saw his wife who works along side him. I was ok with this until she figured out I was a victim of a rare disease. When this became apparent to her, she began pestering me with questions. It ended with her asking "If you would mind me taking a couple pictures of your eyes?" I was reluctant but agreed. Instead of using the provided equipment to take professional pictures, she instead took the machine with a light and mirrors and instead of putting her eye to it, she took two pictures with her iPhone 7. I remember it being an iPhone 7 because it stated that it was on the bill right next to the 75$ price tag of each picture she took. After this I did not want to return for my yearly eye exam but I agreed to with the condition I would Mr.Dr.McCurdy instead of Mrs. So when we made the appointment we made it VERY clear we wanted him, not her. Well wouldn't you know it, who do I see when I walk in the door of the doctor's office. She was happily smiling with one of her nurses there. I sat in the chair waiting for the exam to begin. Instead of doing that, she asks the nurse to sit there and stare at my deformed eyes. After a couple minutes, I spoke up and asked if we could start the exam. She agreed and proceeded to put dilating drops in my eyes. When she got down to look she asked if I still had my contacts in. I said yes. She immediately pulls each of them out of my eye and throws them in the trash before I can react. I tell her those were my last contacts and she pulls them out of the trash and puts them in solution. Well we go on with exam even though I should've left right there. We finish and without asking me anything, she reaches to get the contacts and starts to try to put them in my eye. I ask her what she's doing and I explain to her I don't want contacts from the trash. She tries setting me up with a pair of sample contacts, which weren't even fit to my prescription, the equivalent of me putting on reading glasses when I'm legally blind without proper aid. She tells me we'd laugh this off and I left as quickly as possible. It's been three years or so, Mrs.McCurdy. When do I start laughing?

name: Terry M. Slaton
text:
I have been a patient of Dr. Nichols for several years now and he and his office provides personal and full service care for my eyes.  I have had occasions when an eye injury occurred, something diagnosed as a "detached viscous" which happened first in one eye then, a year later, in the other.  Dr. Nichols explained the first time that it occurred, how important it was to make sure that the condition was watched carefully for the first several weeks or so, until the detachment was complete as it could result in a detachment of the retina during the process.  He told me to call 24 x 7 if I had any issues and that he or one of the other doctors in the office would see me immediately.  This is the kind of service that is unexpected today but shows the care and concern that Dr. Nichols and his office provides.  If you want really good care for your eyes, and thorough examinations, I highly recommend the practice.

TS

text:

name: April
text: The first time I visited I didn’t realize they had just closed and the door was unlocked so I walked in. I was speaking with one of the girls who was very friendly and outgoing and the manager (I’m assuming) wanted to close the store and started waving at the girl helping us, basically implying we needed to leave. I thought this was a little rude. Decided to give them another try and wasn’t impressed at all. This time saw another salesperson, not very knowledgeable which made me feel uneasy because it’s my first pair of glasses. There’s only about 20 frames that fall into the promotion deal so it took me a while to decide. She kept standing right beside me waiting so I felt rushed. The manager came out and told me it would be $70 to add AR. It ended up being $124 because they failed to tell me it’s less money if you send them out to be done vs. in store. I didn’t even get the one hour service because their machine was down so I had to come back the next day. The salesperson didn’t seem to care about any of these issues. I also had to ask her to get a case with them. She just handed me my glasses at first and said here you go. Won’t ever use this store again.

resp.text:
Hello April, thank you for sharing your experience. It looks like there are several areas to address and improve. We are very sorry we didn't gain your future business and we will definitely do training on these specific issues. Please do not hesitate to reach out to us if we can improve your experience. We are here to help. Mary, Eyemart Express Customer Care Manager
Dallas, TX 888-372-2763

text: IT'S  WAS A GREAT EXPERIENCE AND  I AM ENJOYING  MY NEW GLASSES.

name: Klean Media Group
text: First and foremost, I absolutely love how my glasses came out. I bought two pair and they both equaled a total of $63.99. However, the service was suspicious to say the least. Eyemart is advertising multiple pairs of glasses, at an affordable rate. When I went into the store, I noticed the employees were seemingly very nice and eager to help. Long story short, when it came time to purchase my glasses they were tremendously higher then I expected. My total came out to be $143.99 originally. I thought that was strange so I just simply asked is there not a more standard lens that I could get? Suddenly the employee gets nervous, as if I've asked a question that's too sensitive for her to answer. Her boss reacted rather strangely as well. What had happened was, they had rung me up for two pairs of glasses and lenses and instead of asking me what lenses I would like or giving me choices on what they have; they simply just charged me for the most expensive and weren't even trying to provide me with any options. This was very upsetting to me simply because their advertisement says one thing, yet they are not at all trying to correlate such through their services. What is even worse, is that the manager actually brought me an example of what I would be buying going with the cheaper option. Let me be the first to tell you the example she brought out was not what I ended up buying. Which leads me to believe that Eyemart is only after your money. Granted I got my glasses within literally 30 minutes I was a little bit taken back by my experience considering I was trying to be bamboozled. If you go into this store they have a great selection, and I suggest that you go with whatever you like, but I would be very wary of their service and also be sure to ask questions. Thank you.

resp.text:
Hello, thank you for your review. I'm sorry to hear to had a bad experience at our Auburn, AL location. This is not the way Eyemart Express does business. I will have this review formalized and sent to upper management to prevent this from happening again in the future. Thank you again for taking the time to leave us feedback so we can continue to grow as a company. If there is anything else we can do for you please contact our customer service line at 1-888-372-2763. -Mandolin W.
Eyemart Express Customer Care
Dallas, TX 1-888-372-2763

text: It is my sons first time to have eyeglasses and Everyone was so professional and very helpful I really enjoy doing business with the Eyemart in Auburn and would highly recommend them!

name: Lakesha Hart
text: Staff is super friendly, courteous and very knowledgeable about eyeware!!!

name: Debbie Waldroup
text:
The first visit went ok as far as the people being friendly and examing us. we have BCBS Insurance I called ahead to see if they took the Insurance she said yes. We go to our appointment and she takes our card she has to see it or she wouldn't of known they didn't take our insurance because of the mcr on it she didn't tell us nothing about it or we would of went some where else. Our insurance pays for the eye exam and 100.00 towards frames and /or lenses however u want to use it. We take our exams and I come out to the lobby while my eyes are dilating she said I could get with the receptionist and pay or do what I needed to do. Ok  I tell her that I shouldn't owe her anything that our insurance pays for the exam and 100.00 for frames.  I told her I called before we came in to make sure you took our insurance if u didn't we would of gone somewhere else. Then she said that she didn't know we had mct by talking to me on the phone. Ok you shouldn't of said you take it u should of asked about the mcr on the card first before saying I took it. The thing that really got me is I'll give her the phone call. But when we went in for our appointment and she made copies of our cards and highlighted where we had MCR she knew then they didn't take our insurance but she didn't tell us until after we both had our exams and was leaving. I told her that she did not tell us that or we would of went somewhere else. I told her she could file the claim and hope they pay it. We were not very happy about that.
We go next door to get our glasses thinking we can do all of this in one day and be done with it. Wrong again I called and asked did they take our insurance yes we do they just didn't bother to tell me that the machine tht runs the card through hasn't been sent to them yet and they have no way of filing our insurance. But we will call you when it comes in. How long will that be? I'm sorry I have no idea??  So we either go somewhere else or go home and wait on there call thinking it will be just a few days Wrong again. It was a long time before they called us. So we were still aggerivated about the whole thing we weren't sure wether to go back there or not. We did decide that if the insurance didn't pay for the exam that they could write it off or do whatever they wanted to do with that bill we werent going to pay it cause she knew before we had the exams and done them anyway without giving us a choice to have them done or not. So far I haven't got a bill from them or anything from my insurance.
They finally call us and say they can take our insurance now. So my husband goes and gets his done. They look good on him and so far he's satisified.
I went Wednesday and got mine done and picked them up Friday so far I'm very happy with them. I bought the 29.95 year warranty I have narcolepsy and I fall and drop them all the time. I can mess them up I have had my dog to eat them and I'm being serious. I woke up and she was crunching on something I was trying to find my glasses to see what she had  that's when I found the frames.
The people were very nice, the place was nice they just need to have there knowledge together and tell people the right thing and most important tell them if you don't take their insurance before you do nothing to them. We were nice. There's allot of people hat would of caused a big big scene.
Thank you!!
Have a Nice Day!!!!

Debbie Waldroup

resp.text: Hello Debbie, thank you for your review. Your satisfaction is very important to us and we apologize we did not give you a 5 star experience. We will share your feedback with management to avoid these issues in the future. If there is anything we can do to better your experience please contact us at 1-888-372-2763. -Mandolin W. Eyemart Express Customer Care Dallas, TX 1-888-372-2763

name: R D
text:
I have faithfully had an eye check up annually for many years and in no instance have I ever had a more enjoyable Dr. visit. I have been traveling and not in my home state and I needed to get my exam before the end of the year so as to use my insurance allotment for 2020. My first interaction was over the phone to make an appointment. After telling them my situation they were able to fit me in even though there were no other openings until the next Monday which was not possible for me. Next was my meeting with the front desk assistant Kelsey. She was awesome. She was very patient and helpfull in getting all the proper paper worked and doing the preliminary testing before seeing Dr, Nguyen.She was very knowledgeable and took the  time to explain procedures and answer all my questions and all with a smile.
After this I met with Dr. Nguyen and she too was a pleasure to meet with . She was very professional  and answered my concerns. I never felt I was being rushed out of her office. She also made suggestions for me for better eye care. Thank you all.

resp.text: Thank you for your review. Our associates are some of the best around and we are always happy to hear our customers feel the same!

name: Lucy Reed
text: I received excellent personalized service from Dr. Nguyen and Bill. I was impressed! The eye exam was more thorough than I have received from any ophthalmologist. Dr. Nguyen took her time to review the results of  my testing in detail in 3D, over her computer screen, something I have never seen before. Bill advised me to the type of frame best suited to my prescription and repaired my old frames. I highly recommend LensCrafters  in Foley, Alabama.

text:
I'm so disappointed with the service. My family and I have been ordering glasses through Lenscrafters for quite sometimes and never had an issue. But, this time for some reason, they can't get my prescription right. Not to mentioned the several trips back and forth to the store I've made. Within the last few weeks I have ordered 2 pair of glasses. The 1st pair that I ordered was a complete mess, couldn't see anything. My measurements were totally off. Took a chance on ordering another pair and found out that they didn't fill my prescription correctly so therefore I still couldn't see. The guy was very rude. Bluntly accused me of the mistake and not once did he
apologize.  After that he quoted me a ridiculous price to correct their mistake. I was very disappointed so I asked for a refund and left the store.

resp.text: Hi Cynthia, thank you for your review. We are sorry to hear about your experience. We aim to consistently meet and surpass customers' expectations. Please go to http://bit.ly/2Di26GQ so we can follow up with you directly.

name: Alesha Walker
text:
My husband and 7 year old daughter both had eye exams this morning with Dr. Potts. I was so very impressed  with the excellent care and customer service we received. He was very thorough, but still efficient and took time to educate us on each test as he went along. This was our daughter’s first eye exam and she was a bit nervous, but Dr. Potts took time to ask specifically what she was nervous about and addressed that with her, putting her at ease right away. When we left she said “that was actually fun!” :) I would highly recommend Dr. Potts for both adults and children!

The staff at Lens Crafters was very kind and welcoming as well. I also love the ability to schedule   exams online! I can’t speak to assistance from the Lens Crafters staff beyond being welcomed today because fortunately no one needed glasses today, but I’ve had great experience personally in the past. Damon was very knowledgeable and helped me to choose frames that were stylish and comfortable for me last year!

text: Nothing but the best service. And all of the consultants are great! Teresa is a great GM. And Casey is a wonderful sales supervisor!

text: I purchased a pair of Perscreption Ray Ban sun glases from this location 17 months ago. The case that came with the glases forced the temple ends to rest  on the surface of the lenses causing an abrasion on the inside surface of the otherwise perfect glasses. Lenscrafters solution was for me to buy a replacement set of lenses at a reduced cost, So that this same thing will happen again. I am not satisfied with their solution regarding this issue.

text:
Located in the Tanger Outlet in Doley, Al.
I lost mt presciption glasses and they have a one hour on site lab. Even if it was going to take longer, it didnt matter...I needed glasses.
I was immediately greeted upon entrance. Casey was assigned to assit me with my needs.
He was professional, considerate, and patient. I was informed of  the vast selection of frames including the sale they have going on. I picked my frames, which were not on sale, however the price was very fair. My lenses were on sale...40% off! I am so thrilled to see again, and...I only had to wait and hour!
All staff I came in contact with was friendly and courteous and the location is easy to find.

text: Love Dr. Marshall and all the staff at Downtown Eye Care! They are always ready to see my right when I get there and have been so helpful when picking out glasses. I would definitely recommend that you visit them!

name: LaVon Fuller
text:
I've recently moved to Montgomery so I'm starting from scratch with eye doctors, dentist, etc. I initially booked an appointment with Downtown Eye Care simply because it was the nearest one to my home. My first experience was pleasant and Dr. Marshall is very sweet and personable and its apparent he's somewhat new in the practice (opening in 2013. However, the receptionist leaves something to be desired. She's very dry and rude! Maybe it's just me but I expect good customer service from the time I walk in the door until I walk out, ESPECIALLY if I'm paying for a service.
My second visit was booked for the wrong time and I sat in the lobby for an hour just to tell them my contacts fit. And once again she was rude! Anywho, Dr. Marshall, and the lady that fits your glasses were sweet. I'm contemplating going back.

name: Sara Vaughn
text: Love, love, love him and his staff!  Always so helpful and sweet!

resp.text: Thank you so much Sara.  We are more than happy to oblige.  Customer service is not just a job it is a calling.

name: Caitlin Fann
text:
I left a review awhile ago about how awful this place was but I removed it because they said they would fix it.
I have called the place several times to fix my bill ( I get mailed a statement).
When I made the appointment I had my insurance on the phone to make sure what they cover and told the lady I only want to do what my insurance would cover ( I was ordering contacts). I kept getting bills saying I owed money and even though when I had my appointment I was told I would owe anything. I’ve called several time and my mom has also called trying to fix it. The last time I called a lady said that they will call me back within the next week.. I never received a phone call.
Eventually my mom stepped in and they actually hung up on her. We talked to my old insurance company and they said they never even received a claim.
This place has highly disappointed me.
It looks very pleasant on the outside and inside,  but the people that work there are the opposite.

name: Ron Davis
text: I have been a patient of Florence Eye Center for years and I have always received great service. I trust my optometrist (Kathryn) and Lyndsey did a wonderful job recently taking care of getting my new glasses. I have several family members that use this business as well. I fully recommend them.

resp.text: Thank you Ron!

name: Shaun Dalton
text:
I bought eye glasses  here 4 years ago,  as well as my  children's glasses, I've also purchased my contacts here as well.
I noticed the coating coming off one of my lenses a few months ago. Brought it in today and he told me that it is the anti glare coating that is coming off. I asked him if this is normal after just 4 years,  he said not really but it does happen?? I've got glasses I've had 10 years and nothing like this has happened. He could have offered to order me some new lenses and give me a 10.00 discount and I would have felt better about my issues.

He said there is nothing he can do since it's been 4 years. 4 years?  400.00 glasses?
Save your money and go somewhere else.
This shouldn't be happening...

name: tony triolo
text: I went to purchase single vision glasses. The sales girl said I should try the progressive lenses and that if I did not like them, I had 30 days to bring them back and they would replace them. The progressive glasses were $90 more expensive. I did not like the progressive lenses and returned them. They said that they would replace them but not credit me the $90. This was never explained to me at the time or I would have purchased the single vision glasses. Bad business.

name: Vicki
text: Thanks to Billy allowing me to address my concerns/ issues and his professionalism  I was able to have resolution and look forward to a better experience in the future. Thanks again!

resp.text: We are so sorry to hear that you are having trouble reaching us.  Please feel free to call our office and ask Lindsay. We will certainly make every attempt to help you. 256.766.3139.

name: Kristi Whitlock
text: I had my first visit today with Raleigh and Dr. Thigpen. Both ladies were amazing. So patient with me as I was nervous for my visit and as I tried on almost every pair of frames they have in stock. It was a great experience. They made me feel very comfortable and confident in my final selections. I couldn’t have hoped for more and I cannot wait to pick up my glasses!

resp.text: Thank you Kristi!!!

name: Michelle Hayes
text: Excellent service!!! Dr. Thigpen is awesome as is all the staff! Amelya was also great and so friendly!!! This was my first eye exam and eyeglass purchase!! Highly recommend!!!

name: Tina Simmons
text: Still waiting for reordered glasses. I waited for the first order for three weeks. I finally called to check, and they said they had the glasses, but had failed to get my phone number. 🙄 So they had just been sitting there. As it turns out, they ordered the wrong kind of lenses, so they reordered over a week ago. Haven’t heard a word. I will call them tomorrow. Maybe they’ve had them there again, although I did double check that they had my number. They have a nice showroom, but if they are going to be overpriced, then they should at least be fast and professional.

name: Alydia Murphy
text: I have been going to the Florence eye center for some time now they are amazing. They’ve got a wide variety of glasses along with glasses accessories and more. Ms.Amanda is a sweet lady she will make you feel at home. She tries to make the patients feels comfortable and wanted. Not saying that everyone here doesn’t do the same probably just as well. But if you want true service check this place out.

resp.text: We appreciate your confidence and trust in us, Alydia!

name: Jennifer Markham
text: I am so thankful for the Florence Eye Center! They are very professional but more than that they are extremely kind.... Thanks to you all!

resp.text: Thank you, Jennifer! Please let us know if we can be of any additional assistance to you.

name: Wendell Moore
text:
It’s a nice place but it’s overpriced for the service you get. I have good vision insurance but they charge you separate for everything it seems. Other places I’ve been to the copay is $10-$25. Here it was $60. Then I priced glasses and was quoted $250 with insurance, came back with cash and somehow they miscalculated and it jumped to almost $400. Then I ordered contacts when my insurance reset and they said I didn’t owe anything, a while later I got a call saying I was being turned over to collections if I didn’t pay money owed. Somehow owed $80 so I paid it. Then I got an eye infection and they kept prescribing $120 drops and it never helped.  Went yo another doctor and was prescribed $10 drops and it cleared it up. Wouldn’t recommend
And no I didn’t use my real name and email

name: Kylie Murks
text: Florence Eye Center is where me and my family will ALWAYS go for our vision needs! Taryn is a tremendous help! She was with us during the exam and picking out glasses AND even ordered our contacts. She can do it all! They also did an exam on my son before he was a year old! Thanks for being awesome to our family!

resp.text: Wow! Thank you Kylie.  You're like family to us.  Taryn really can do it all.  We are so glad that you and your family chose us to be your eye care team!!!

name: Brittany Drowns
text: It was the best customer service I could've asked for! Amanda Brown was the sweetest from the moment I went back to the room! She helped me pick out frames that fit my face and I was so thankful as this is my first time ever wearing glasses! Absolutely 100% pleased.

resp.text: Thank you Brittany!

name: Roy Pearson
text: i would give zero stars if i could. this place sucks

resp.text: We are certainly sorry to learn that you feel this way.  We strive to provide excellence in eye care and eyewear for our patients.  It appears that we have fallen short of our intended goals with you.  We would love the opportunity to change your opinion.  Give us a call at (256) 766-3139 and ask to speak with one of our wonderful managers.

name: Tammy Prince
text: I love this office & will never go anywhere else! They have tons of glasses to choose from and even if they don’t have what you’re looking for, they will find it! The opticians are great and very informative. Such a great atmosphere & amazing service! Thanks!

resp.text: Tammy, thank you for your confidence & trust in us!  We certainly appreciate it.

name: Karan Brawner
text: This office is absolutely beautiful!  I went in looking for frames and Sally helped me.  I tried on many frames and she was very patient and I valued her opinion.  We found the perfect frame for me!!!  Sally is a great asset to your office staff.

resp.text: You are absolutely correct.  Sally is amazing!  Her experience combined with her knowledge simply cannot be duplicated.  Thank you for taking time to offer your opinion of our office and staff!  : )

name: Ginger Witt
text: Florence Eye Center is amazing! Great atmosphere. Best eye doctors and staff around. Sally Pigg, the technician that took care of us was extremely knowledgeable and awesome to work with! Definitely knows her job and how to help. Would recommend to anyone!

resp.text: Wow! Thank you Ginger!  We appreciate you taking time to offer your opinion of our office and staff.  Please let us know if we can be of any additional service to you.

name: Emily Miles
text: I can’t say enough great things about this office, from  start to finish the staff was professional, informative, and caring. I found Taryn was extremely informative and made sure I understood everything before moving on to the next step. She certainly took her time with me and became personable makeing sure my experience was nothing short of amazing. I am completely happy with my experience and will definitely recommend this office to friends and family.

resp.text: : ) Big, Huge, Gigantic smiles from all us at Florence Eye Center!!!

name: Susan Shirley
text: I’ve been going to Florence Eye Center for years. I’ve always had a wonderful experience with everyone. Sally has always been very helpful with everything from the prep before my exam to helping pick out my glasses! She is so knowledgeable about her job! Thanks so much!!!

name: J Conlee
text:
Great atmosphere! Great staff! I especially respected the fact that my tech-person, Kiersten put my phobia of eye doctors to rest. She was calm and took her time to explain each step. And the eye doctor got the debris out of my eye on the first try!!

**edit**

As a former “disgruntled employee” I would have to note that any and all reviews above 3 stars were made with fraudulent intent to cover up the poor reviews of actual customers. The management had a contest for whichever employee has the most high rated reviews on google gets $500.
I don’t understand why they didn’t want to invest their time and money in properly training their staff especially after asking the management several times for help, guidance and training with no avail. Just click on each review and notice how the commenter says similar things for different locations of this branch out in muscle shoals and Madison.
But thank you “owners” (management) for replying to your own employee to toot your own horn and make yourself look like a half decent medical establishment. This isn’t a day spa, people actually come here for medical help and look here for honest reviews from actual customers bc they are spending money on their physical well being, not on a nice day out.

resp.text: We are happy that you such a good experience at our office!  Kudos to Kiersten!

name: Michael Darling
text:
My first visit, with an appointment, I was taken back and left in an exam room for 1 1/2 hr until I opened the door and yelled for someone to help me. Another wait for 20 minutes and I was leaving when the eye doc came in. He said “ oh, I was busy, did no one come tell You?”
This time the ordered my glasses, told me two weeks, and after almost three weeks, I had to go by the office..no one answered the phone tho I tried 3 times... the young girl seemed miffed that I asked her to check if they were in. They were, they handed them to me and said good bye...no fitting to face, no checking if they were right...nothing.
I will find a VSP provider other than FEC next year.

resp.text: We certainly hate to hear that you had a bad experience in our office. It definitely sounds like we failed to provide the level of service we strive for.  Please accept our apologies.

name: Josh Vincent
text: After Walmart quit taking our vision insurance, we made the switch and I’m glad we did. This is a great office, great environment, nice staff and the best doctors. We had great help from Taryn in helping select the correct frame with the best fit. I’ll definitely be back. Thanks!

name: Macie Pigg
text: This place is awesome! Great staff, beautiful set up, outstanding selections of frames. I will definitely be going here for all of my eye care needs!

resp.text:
(Translated by Google) Thank you Macie!

(Original)
Thank you Macie!

name: Bill Crawford
text: I enjoyed my experience with this office.  The technology is out of this world.  I had never seen the back of my eye until now.  Thankful for a great experience and Taryn is helpful with glasses selection.

resp.text: Thank you Bill!  We are glad that you had a great experience at our office.  We make every effort to remain at the forefront of technology....thanks for noticing!

text: I sincerely appreciate the kindness of these good people. Not a long wait at all and staff so courteous. Now Dr Basden he is so considerate, polite, and respectful. I am a diabetic and was having some issues. Dr Basden did a through exam, found the problem and now we are working on things. I am a satisfied lifetime customer.

resp.text: Thank you Mr. Swindle! We appreciate your kind words. Please let us know if we can be of any additional assistance to you.

name: Gary Sparks
text: Florence Eye Center is a place where you can find quality help from quality people. One of which is Bailey Pickens. Bailey is great at what she does! She cares for customers like family. For all of your eye care needs, you’ll be satisfied at Florence Eye Center!

resp.text: Thank you Gary!  You're absolutely correct about Bailey.  She loves what she does almost as much as the patients she helps.

name: April Smith
text: Bailey Pickens is the sweetest person! Very sweet and helpful! You are the best. Specks downtown is a very nice facility! You rock Bailey!!!

text: Florence Eye Center has a good variety of frames, and Bailey Pickens is very helpful. She has nice taste. She is very polite and friendly.

text: I've been going here for almost 4 years now and I love the staff here. I started out with glasses in 6th grade, they were very helpful in helping me find the perfect frames. name: BJ Wilson
text: Our family loves Florence Eye Center! A courteous and professional staff, like Bailey Pickens, make appointments a breeze.

name: Flory Stucky
text: I'm new to town and had an accident where my glasses got stepped on; the frame was bent and a lens had fallen out. I walked in without an appointment and asked if they could help me out. They had my glasses bent back in shape and the lens in within minutes and no charge! Great service all the way around. Looks like we found our new eye care center!

resp.text: Welcome to the Shoals area! We are happy to have you as part of our community.  Thank you for your kind words! We are glad we were able help you today. Please let us know if we can be of any additional assistance to you.

name: Bridgette Cummings
text: Taryn is the absolute best. I definitely recommend her!

resp.text: Thank you Bridgette!

name: Patricia McCoy
text: Wrong lens inserted on left eye, tried to replace it but it wouldn't come out. Right eye ok after lens implant for distance. Wish I had never wasted the $$ or time. I could see better with my contacts. Florence Eye Center in SC.

resp.text: I'm sorry..I am having trouble finding you in our system. What doctor did you see? We do not do implant surgery at this office. I think you may have us confused with another office. We will be glad to help you in anyway we can in the future.   We are Florence Eye Center in Florence, Alabama.

name: Mason Boersma
text: I had an amazing experience with Taryn, she was super helpful and sweet as well! I highly suggest Florence Eye Center!

resp.text: Taryn knows her stuff!  Sounds like we are preaching to the choir.  Thanks Mason!

name: jackie smith
text: My mother went here for glasses, both times she was not helped or even spoke to. She had to go to the front desk and ask for help after sitting waiting for over 20 minutes. Terrible customer service and very rude. Would not recommend.

resp.text: Jackie, please accept our apology on behalf of your mother.  We pride ourselves on providing excellent customer service and assistance. We are disappointed to learn that we failed to do so with your mother.  Can you tell us the day of the week your mother was in the office?  We will not tolerate this behavior from our staff.

name: slim whitman
text:
Only reason I gave it one star is because there was not a zero option, worst experience I've ever had. Been wearing contacts for over thirty years, have never paid a "fitting" fee. Basically, my contact prescription is being held hostage unless I pay an additional $65.00, after having a contact exam. I'll never step foot into one of these facilities again, and will quickly discourage anyone considering doing so. BTW, I had a contact only exam performed for less than the "fitting" fee, what a joke.

"Edit" Of course I used a different email than my actual email address, funny how you only addressed that instead of the "hostage fee" you charge in addition to the billed charges to ones' insurance. And no, I'm quite positive it was your facility (Muscle Shoals).

resp.text:
We have researched our appointments history and do not see a male patient with the last name Whitman for the past 6 months.   We hope that you mistaken our office with another.   If not, we are certainly sorry to learn that you feel this way about our practice.    It sounds like you've found a practice that suits you.  We hope that you will be happy there.  If we can be of service, please don't hesitate to call us.

Slim, we really aren't sure what to say at this point.  We do have an office in Muscle Shoals and we do charge a fee to fit a patient with contact lenses.  The fee is usual & customary.  Contact lenses are an option not necessity.  If you choose to wear contact lenses, you pay the fee to be evaluated.  We feel the same as you.  We aren't the right office for you.

name: Lafayette Mecham
text: What an incredible place! Beautiful office, great frame selection, and attentive doctors and staff! 👍👍👍I am bringing my entire family here.

resp.text: Thank you!  We make every effort to make each patient's experience with us exceptional.  We certainly appreciate your kind words!

text: love it here!

name: Sinnerella
text: Best thing about this place is Dr Basden. Very kind Doctor.

resp.text: Thank you for your kind comments about Dr. Basden!  Is there anything we can do to improve your opinion of our practice?

name: Jena Smith
text: The was every nice.only thing i don't like is how long i have to wait for my glasses .

resp.text: Jena, thanks for taking the time to send us feedback about your experience at our office.  We certainly appreciate your input!  We agree.  We don't like that patients have to wait for their glasses either.  Many insurance carriers now dictate which lens labs we can order eyeglass lenses from.  Your insurance is one of them.  If you want or need glasses sooner, we will gladly make you a pair in our in-house lab.  Insurance would not cover that pair but we can make them while you wait.  It will take approximately 1 hour.  Have a wonderful day!!!

name: Carmilla Evans
text: They are very nice and everyone keeps a smile on their face. Love you guys, thanx for the hospitality.

resp.text: Thank you so much!  Have a wonderful weekend!

name: Julie Oliverius Online
text: Great set up inside the office and very helpful, friendly staff.  I highly recommend them.

resp.text: Julie, Thank you so very much!!!  We are thrilled to know that you had a great experience at our office.  We apologize for not replying sooner.  Somehow, we missed your kind review.  Again, thank you and please let us know if we can be of service to you!

name: Angie Gibson
text: Beautiful  office,  super friendly  staff.  Open on Saturday.

resp.text: Wow! Thank you so much, Angie!  We certainly appreciate your kind words. Please let us know if we can do anything for you.

name: Leornard Smith
text: Poor service. Walked in to look at frames before I made an appointment to get an idea on prices. I was in my work clothes and I guess I didn't look good enough to be a customer. Couldn't get anyone to help me or even make eye contact. Maybe they need glasses lol.

resp.text: Mr. Smith, please accept our apologies for not offering our assistance.   Our front desk & optical staff pride themselves on providing excellent customer service.  We are certainly displeased to learn that we didn't perform our jobs well for you.  We would love an opportunity to regain your trust and confidence.  Please accept our most sincere apologies.

name: Josh Phillips
text: Thanks Taryn for helping my boys with their glasses.

name: Mother Kids
text: I called yesterday they said I didn't need an appointment just come on in today. Got here today they are all booked up. Flashing sign saying walk in now.

resp.text: We are so sorry. Our schedule filled very quickly today...much quicker than we anticipated.  Please accept our apologies.

name: Dena Wilson
text: Super nice doctors. Good staff.

name: Stanley Carter
text: Great staff and service

name: Stanley Booker
