name: Richard Herron
text: Our family has been using Alabama Family Eye Care for several years now and we could not be more pleased. Dr. Curl is amazing! She takes the necessary time to accurately diagnose and treat any and all of your vision care needs. My 9 year old just had his first “official” eye exam and even he commented on how nice Dr. Curl and her staff treated him. I would highly recommend this practice if you are looking for a doctor who will treat you like a person and not just a number.

name: Mary Waldman
text: I ended up in Dr Curl's chair with a piece of dirt in my eye. I'm so happy I did because she's a wonderful doctor who removed it quickly and painlessly. Her office staff is professional and efficient and the office clean and attractive. Everyone observed correct hygene which I appreciate.

name: Sam Addy
text: Dr. Curl and the staff at Alabama Family Eye Care have seen to the eye health of my entire family for years, in my case at least 15 years.  They are always caring, courteous, knowledgeable, and professional.  I have recommended them to others and will continue doing so.  They are just great.

name: Jerry S
text: Dr Curl is one of the very best. My entire family has used her for 16 years. Their office is top notch, service from staff is outstanding and Dr Curl is a true professional. I highly recommend them.

name: Jennifer Sinelnikov
text: Very knowledgeable staff. Everyone wearing a mask. Able to answer all questions asked. Very helpful!!!

name: Brian Barksdale
text: Dr. Curl is awesome! Very thorough exam and testing, and pleasant experience overall. She does a great job explaining everything along the way. Highly recommend!

name: Andrea Steed
text: Dr. Curl and her staff were extremely thorough, kind, personable and helpful throughout my entire appointment.  She made contact and glasses suggestions based on my lifestyle.  I felt like she and the rest of her staff was quick and efficient, but I never felt rushed.  I will definitely continue to receive my eye care here!

name: Paul Mascia
text:
Been a patient of doc Curl for 14 years. Enough said. Regarding the 1star rating: Yo! How about YOU checking coverage out with your insurance company BEFORE you call a doctor???!!!. 2star rating: I was there last month and yes it took 2 weeks to get my glasses...that' s exactly what they told me!
See you next year doc.

name: nkeiru obi
text:
I came here because of all the wonders reviews, but just as a few commenters have said, I was not impressed. They were unorganized in calling my name to be led to the back, they let someone go ahead of me who came after me and had an appointment later than mine.
The gentleman who did the preliminary questions of my eye care was apologetic, I appreciated this. I had the eye doctor with long brown hair...not sure if this was Dr. Curl, I’m not sure that I care anyway...  I found her to be passive aggressive, she attempted to sound sincere when I asked questions but she was rushing me. Looking back I think they were a little behind schedule... but I’m not sure that’s an excuse.
The collection of glassware was nothing to write home about, it wasn’t in style, I was under impressed.
It took a full 2 weeks for the glasses I ordered to come in, I’m not sure if this is really their fault, but worth mentioning....
Flashforward to about 3-4 months later these “new” glasses already broke. It was covered in my insurance for a replacement  but they still made me pay a $20 dollar processing fee. 🤭
Needless to say, I won’t be returning ...But I do want to be fair...so  why did I give 2 stars.. here’s why:
1. The eye doctor ( lady with brown hair) was thorough.. still abrasive
2. The girl who measured the glasses to my face after they came in was very polite, she seemed genuine in wanting to help me find a pair I liked, she was honest
3. They give free bottles of water and fruit snacks and mints while waiting

name: G C
text: I have been using Dr. Curl for several years and always have received great care and treatment.  Very thorough, explains every step clearly and plainly, and her staff is professional yet friendly.  Great place!

name: Sharon Grimes
text:
The Optometrists at Alabama Family Eye Care are the best in my opinion! As I have grown older I have more eye problems and they have helped me through them! The staff is the best also, very knowledgeable, warm and friendly! I'm very happy with Alabama Family Eye Care.

Sharon Grimes

name: Ron Baldwin
text: Prior to moving out of state, my wife and I used Alabama Family Eye Care for a number of years.  Both of us were very pleased with the care that we received.  When I located a new optometrist, she confirmed all of the same potential vision issues that Dr. Curl had been tracking for me.

name: Chainsaw McCulloch
text:
Look - 5 stars says absolute professionalism!!!!  I don’t know of any doctor that takes the time with her patients as much as Dr Kurl does.

The ability of the techs on the optical side are just the same. The attention is wonderful and complete. The part I love is if there is any problem (and I mean any problem) with the glasses OR contacts they always do it for free if something isn’t right.

name: Dougie Fresh
text:
I would give it 10 stars if I could! Amazing staff, beautiful and convenient location in Hoover. They treat you like family and that is very rare at a doctor's office. They walk you through everything and make you feel super comfortable the entire time. The techs are polite, informative and super knowledgeable. The prices are great too!

For those who are tired of being treated like you are just another patient, go here. I promise you, it will be the best decision you have ever made for your family.

name: Jennifer Patton
text: If you are looking for a great optometrist, your search is over.  Dr. Curl is fantastic in every way.  Beautiful office with the newest technology, competent, caring staff, and excellent time management are just a few of the things that that will impress you about this office.  Dr. Curl is thorough and makes me feel  confident that the health of my eyes are in good hands.  I wouldn't go anywhere else.

name: Elizabeth Zazueta
text: I am very happy with Dr. Curl & highly recommend her. I have a few issues she has been checking for me & I guarantee you she is very thorough. She does an excellent job of explaining test results, comparing last year's results to this year's & she makes sure to wait for you when she asks, "do you have any questions". I am fond of her technicians. They have always been very kind to me. I have never felt rushed. Picking out glasses has been fun. I just purchased another pair & I enjoyed being allowed to take my time & try on as many as I wanted. I never felt rushed. I feel she truly cares about my well being & that is what we all want. I highly recommend you go see Dr. Curl.

name: Donald Henry
text:
I've been a patient at Alabama Family Eye Care for the last couple of years.  My experience with the staff has always been exceptional and they make me feel like I'm part of their family.

Dr. Curl and Dr. Craig's exams are thorough, as they takes her time to make sure I have the best possible prescription for my contacts glasses.  Dr. Curl recommended a specific type of lenses for my vision and they are awesome!

The optical section has a great selection of fashion forward glasses and the optician did a great job in helping me find the right pair of frames for my personal style.

I will be a patient for many years to come!

name: Lydia Kirkland
text: I’ve been going here since I was in high school, I love the atmosphere and friendly nature of the staff. I never wait too long and if I have an emergency they always are able to fit me in. Great frame selection as well!!

name: Mary Horne
text: Dr. Curl recommended cataract surgery and also recommended a fantastic surgeon. She took care of my eyes post surgery . She is very very thorough and consistent. I trust her so much that I sent my son to see her. She has taken excellent care of his m as well.

name: Veronda Berry
text: Dr. Kurl always gets my prescription spot on. The staff is very friendly, knowledgeable and helpful. I would recommend Alabama Family Eyecare to anyone.

resp.text: Thank you so much for the kind words!

name: Maria Fandetti
text: Last minute call for emergency appointment and took me right in. Excellent concern and care.

name: Betty MIMI
text: Excellent service. I appreciate the detailed information about my eye health.

name: Jolene Bernhardt
text: I arrived on time and was greeted by the friendly front desk staff. The wait was less than 5 minutes. I was immediately evaluated by a student doctor who was quite thorough. However, some of my numbers seemed to be incorrect. I waited less than 2 or 3 minutes for Dr Craig. She agreed the numbers weren't matching up to my previous visits. She performed her evaluation and we were thrilled to discover my pressure in both eyes had decreased significantly! Great news! She recommended I return in a few months for my regular pressure check. Checkout was quick and the staff was extremely polite and helpful. I couldn't be more pleased with my experiences with Alabama Family Eye Care.

name: Sherrie F
text: I've been seeing Dr. Curl for 18 yrs. She's the best eye doctor I've ever been to. Her whole staff is friendly and very helpful. Very nice office too. I would recommend Alabama Family Eye Care to anyone.

name: Matt Gray
text: Thanks to Dr. Curl & her amazing staff, I get fantastic eye care. They have all the latest technology to insure that I maintain great eyesight. The care here is excellent & should you need eye wear they have the perfect fit & style.

name: Marty Johnson
text: Great service and care

name: Joe Cory
text: We've had great care by their Ophthalmologists. They are good with kids, thorough, and do a good job of talking through any issues or questions we have. We recently had a billing issue, but their staff helped resolve the issue in a timely manner.

name: Terri K
text: I came to Dr Curl with multiple issues. She couldn’t have been more patient and helpful!  She answered all my questions throughly and didn’t make me feel foolish for asking them. A previous office visit to an ophthalmologist in Vestavia was quite the opposite experience. Thank you Dr Curl!

name: Cletis Smith
text: I've been a patient of Dr. Curl for over 10 years and by far the best and most thorough  eye care I've experienced. A warm, tremendous atmosphere that's comforting for all. Always great to visit and see Drs. Curl, Craig and the staff.

name: Terri K
text: I came to Dr Curl with multiple issues. She couldn’t have been more patient and helpful!  She answered all my questions throughly and didn’t make me feel foolish for asking them. A previous office visit to an ophthalmologist in Vestavia was quite the opposite experience. Thank you Dr Curl!

name: Sally Holsonback
text: Excellent eye care in every respect from Dr. Curl!  I highly recommend her and the staff at Alabama Eye Care.

name: Tracy Hendrix
text: Wonderful doctors and staff.  Very thorough exams.  Very friendly people.  Would highly recommend.

name: Paul Armstrong
text: Dr. Curl and her staff are warm and welcoming. A professional atmosphere, thorough examinations and complete eye care.

name: Bradley Isbell
text: The first question I asked them was do you accepted my type of eye insurance. After I made my appointment I asked them again to make sure. Well guess what? They don't. I wasted my time and lost money taking off of work because they clearly don't care about other people's lives/schedule. Thanks for nothing. You guys suck.

resp.text:
Bradley,

We apologize for our mistake with your insurance. We do accept your type of vision insurance, but the person who booked you was not aware that there are a few plans under that specific insurance that we are not allowed to accept (This is mandated by the insurance company, not us). We absolutely care about your time and schedule and sincerely apologize for our mistake.

name: Sarah Singleton
text: The staff here has been a blessing! Incredibly helpful!

name: Carrie Richardson
text: great service and friendly staff that was helpful!

name: Lindsey Alexander
text: So quick, thorough, and friendly. I’m switching from an eye doctor I’ve used for nearly 10 years.

name: Shuntá Holmes
text: Great Place! Knowledgeable and friendly staff.

name: jane smith
text: Great staff and excellent care!

name: Joey West
text: Such a nice team!

name: Kris Seeley
text: Sorry to say, I use to be a client of theirs until today. I had made an eye appointment over 2 weeks ago and took off work to go there. I was told they tried to call and it went to busy signal. I asked what number they had and they had my old cell number. Never during the conversation setting up the appointment did they ask or confirm if that was a good number. in my 30 years in retail we make sure the number we have is a good number. The person at the desk said they don't update information like that over the phone. I wasted the drive over and now had to set up another appointment elsewhere. I was given a second time of later that day, but people DO have to work and don't have the time or the patience to go back and forth for an eye exam. Will not recommend or go again again.

resp.text:
Hello Kris,

We are so disappointed to learn about your negative experience. Our mission to make sure scheduling is easy and simple. We are deeply apologetic we failed you and not updating your information to the most current contact information. We take feedback like yours seriously and will forward your experience to our senior leadership, and in the meantime, please contact us directly at myeyedr.com/patientrelations, so we can make this right. We look forward to speaking with you. Best Regards

name: Robin Hayes
text: I dropped off my prescription on Thursday. I was told 7-10 days. So, today I get a message that my glasses were ready to be picked up TODAY. Super fast! Awesome customer service!! I would highly recommend them to everyone!!

resp.text:
Hi Robin,
Thank you so much for your five star review! At MyEyeDr, we aim to be your trusted eyecare provider and assist you with all of your vision needs. We are beyond delighted to hear that you had a great experience with us and received your new glasses so quickly! Thank you for being our valued patient, and we look forward to helping you again soon!
Warmest Regards, Patient Relations

name: Linda Clugstone
text: Dr. Vandiver is awesome - this man knows his stuff.  The staff are all friendly and helpful.  Thank you for helping me see the computer screen!

resp.text:
Hi Linda,

Thank YOU for the great 5 STAR review!! Dr. Vandiver and the team there are truly great! We understand how important computer glasses are as most of us experience eye strain from long hours on the computer. We are glad you we were well taken care of, look forward to seeing you soon!
Warm regards,
Patient Relations

name: Ana Maria Clare Emmi
text: Great store! I recently relocated to Huntsville. Had been My Eye Dr for 10 years in VA. Absolutely, loved them. Today, I visit this store. Pleasant atmosphere. Great selection of frames. Kayla was wonderful. Knowledgeable, patience, and sweet. Definitely, I will keep coming back.

resp.text: Awesome Review Ann Maria, Thank You.  Kayla really enjoyed your feedback.    We can't wait to see you again.  Visit us at www.myeyedr.com to schedule your next visit 24/7.  Take Care!

name: J C
text: A very busy Eye Care practice. Dr. McCoy is a good doctor. She remove cataracts from my eyes as well as my wife’s. The surgery’s went great. I highly recommend Dr. McCoy.

resp.text: We're glad to hear that you had a great experience at our Providence location. Our doctors dedicate themselves to providing our patients with the best eye care experience. We appreciate your kind words and appreciate the time you've taken to let us at MyEyeDr. know how we did. Feel free to stop by anytime as it has been a joy serving you

name: Dawn Nelson
text: I paid $800 for eyeglasses that I cannot use. The prescription is wrong. I went back to the office twice. Dr. Vandiver wrote the wrong prescription for distance vision. I returned to my previous MyEyeDr location in Birmington AL for a new evaluation and received a eyeglasses that work.

resp.text:
Hello Dawn,

We are extremely disappointed we were not able to provide you the service you deserve.  We understand how important to have eyeglasses that work. Our goal is to provide quality products at great prices. Your feedback is essential to us in helping us improve. Please respond directly at myeyedr.com/patientrelations, so we can make this right. Kind Regards

name: C H
text: The staff was friendly throughout the whole process. But my main issue is that I told the tech that I don’t want to eye test with the spiral machine. We skipped and it initially and started the preparation for actually eye doctor to start my exam for glasses. Then, after a couple of random pre exam questions he states let’s go back in the room with the machine and take a look at your eyes one more time. At the end of everything I was charged 35 dollars for something I did not want. Also, the frames are extremely over priced. I took my prescription I got from them to Costco and purchased my glasses.Too much up selling at this location.

resp.text: Hello, we’re so sorry to hear that you did not receive the level of service you deserve as our valued patient. While the health of your vision is our top priority, it’s also important that we honor the request made by our patients. We would like to take the time to further address your concerns. Please contact us at myeyedr.com/patientrelations. We hope to hear from you soon. Warm regards.

name: Katie Drake
text:
Dr. Paul Vandiver is the best! I have had problems with my left eye being very red for 6 years. I have been to several eye doctors in Athens, Madison, and Huntsville and I even had a visit in Vanderbilt. Not one of them could tell me what was wrong with my eye. So for 6 years I have constantly had people asking me “What’s wrong with your eye?” “Why is your eye so red?” “Are you okay?” And it was so aggravating because I never knew what to tell them.
Well, today was my first day seeing Dr. Vandiver and this SAME DAY he gave me an answer!! He was just as excited as I was and it feels so good to finally have an eye doctor that truly cares. I wish I would have seen him years ago. And even better, he accepts Medicaid! Now on top of him being a great doctor and knowing what he’s talking about, he also just loves to help people! He was so nice and explained everything in many different ways. I cannot say enough great things about him! They have a great staff and everyone is so nice!!

name: Celeste
text:
They were very nice and helpful in the office, but good luck having them take care of things when you leave. The only reason they got more than one star is because of how great the doctor and the lady that set everything up before him were. I paid to have my glasses shipped to my school address because I'm a college student out of state. A week after my appointment I got a text saying my prescription was ready for pick up. They were supposed to be shipped to me so I called them and reminded them (They told me they would take care of it and apologized). At this point, I thought "No big deal. Accidents happen." Another 3ish days go by and I didn't get a UPS tracking number so I called again (They told me that the glasses were still there and they would send it out that day, apologizing again). I started to get frustrated at this point. After all of this, I finally got an email saying my package has shipped. Too bad they sent it to my parents' address in town. At this point, I got fed up with the incompetence so I asked my parents to send them to me on their own. At least I knew it would get taken care of. To top it all off, they refused to refund me the shipping. I guess I'll be refusing to continue my business with them if they dont care about correcting their mistakes.

I highly recommend not going to this location for anything other than an eye exam. Buy your glasses elsewhere. If you buy them here, you'll be lucky if they make it to you.

resp.text: Celeste, we are very disappointed to hear about the delays while trying to have your glasses shipped to you at college. If you will provide your contact information to myeyedr.com/patientrelations, we will certainly take care of having your shipping charges refunded to you. Our sincere apologies for the errors. We would like to take care of this for you. Hope to hear from you soon.

name: Tammie Sarjahani
text:
I was so impressed with the entire staff here.
Dr. Vandiver is so thorough a d made sure I understood everything before leaving.
I would highly recommend this office in Providence!!

name: Joseph Lemon
text:
I came to this location to get a contacts and glasses prescription and both took months longer than they should have.  The office does not return calls and the admin personnel seem very poorly trained.  I arrived at my first appointment and was told that I would receive a call when my contacts were ready for pickup.  2 weeks later, I finally called them and was informed that they had forgotten to order them.  2 weeks after that, I called again and they finally said, "oh, they're right here."

I picked them up and the prescription was no good.  I went to a second appointment to have the prescription altered and the same thing happened again.  It took forever to receive my contacts and I had to call every single time to get any updates on when they would arrive.

I finally received my final iteration of contacts and they are worse than before I went in.  Lots of wasted time and money.

Everyone is super nice, I'll grant them that, but it's as if they were all hired on the same day and told to just figure it all out for themselves.

name: Shavonne Lang
text: I Picked my eyeglasses out on February 27 and was told I could have them exactly like the demo. They came back a little over 2 weeks later and they were not like the demo. I explained thet the blue tint was missing. After a few mishaps I finally got the glasses I wanted and was able to get a great deal on a second pair.

name: Lorraine Strobel
text: I arrived late but was still seen. Eye exam was not rushed. Got frames fine. Customer service was great.Definitely coming back here.

name: Owen Funkhouser
text:
I really enjoyed my eye exam and the thoroughness in which Dr Vandiver explained the problems with my aging eyes. A+ Even the staff are super friendly, helpful, and responsive. For example, if I leave a message for Stephanie, I get call back within a few minutes.

But the lab they use for glasses is unacceptable and unfortunately, it is out of their control. My insurance requires them to use a VSP lab and the VSP lab has extremely poor quality control. For example, on June 14th I ordered glasses and paid over $500. Glasses arrived 4 weeks later but the lab messed up the order and they were sent back. Glasses arrived again on July 16th and were sent back because lab messed up again. Glasses arrived on July 25th and were sent back as the lab messed up again.

My fear is that MyEyeDr will drop VSP insurance if this continues, as the poor quality in VSP labs reflects poorly on MyEyeDr and affects future business. MyEyeDr did reach out to me and said that they are elevating this to corporate. I am hoping that VSP will instead make right on this, as VSP is the only vision insurance available through my employer.

name: Brian Yount
text: I’ve had nothing but great experiences at the Providence location. The doctor and staff are very friendly and informative. Dr. Vandiver is the best doctor I’ve ever seen. His exams are thorough, and he is helpful with any eye issue. As far as the review from J Bathauer who has a history of giving 1 star reviews, floaters can not be billed to vision insurance, which only covers a routine eye exam. Medical insurance is used for any eye medical issue. The doctor specializes in optometry, so they probably deal with those issues on a daily basis. Schaeffer Eye Center has always been professional and is the only place I’ll go for my eye care needs. They stay busy for a reason!

name: Anita Beatty
text: Stephanie was a great help to me in picking out replacement frames.  While there big rainstorm and she even walked me to my car with an umbrella. Far and beyond great customer service.

name: Wayne S
text: Dr. VANDIVER is Awesome!

resp.text: Wayne, we thank you for your five-star rating. We are delighted to know that our Doctor took great care of you. We look forward to seeing you again at our Providence location. Take Care!

text: After buying glasses from Jc penny they were the wrong  prescription I was first told you didn't buy the insurance after acting  stupid . They sent them back 3 times to get them right. I called the  corporate office she said oh yes just go to the store. (Me) I did an your rep said y'all don't do that. They are untrained people DON'T go to jcpenny optical.

name: TM
text:
This optical is horrible. I waited for 45 minutes then left on my first visit. The second visit I picked glasses and the manager messed up and had to enter them into the system several times (it took over an hour). The third visit they had my glasses ready, but my frames were damaged, so they sent them off again. The fourth visit, I my frames were in store with no prescription lenses. The next visit I picked up my frames, but quickly realized the prescription in one eye was inaccurate.I took the glasses to my eye dr, and she examined the glasses and told me the prescription was not the one she had prescribed and was "way off". On the next visit to JCP optical, they refused to admit their mistake. I will NEVER go to this location again
I have also had a friend who had a similar experience. The manager (angela) at this location has no idea what she's doing. I've never received such horrible service with eyeware ever. I hope to spare anyone else this type of experience. Buying glasses should be a pleasant and exciting experience.

name: Linda Brown
text: Never buy glasses at Penneys Riverchase ,Hoover. 3 months, still no glasses. Sick and tired of the excuses !!!! Already paid for. Think it's time they pay me for the 3 months of waiting. Again, never go there, you'll be blind as a bat, before you get your glasses !!!!!

name: No Way
text: Wowee!! Dr. Kuo was very knowledgeable and thorough. She explained things during the eye exam that I'd never heard before. One important thing that I liked is that she used seperate lenses that she placed up to my eyes and asked me to distinguish the differences when I looked through them and when they were removed. Because those changes were not dramatically different, Dr. Kuo recommended my prescription not be changed. This was good news for me because I didn't need to get my eyes used to another stronger prescription. Dr. Kuo was outstanding and my experience with Lenscrafters today was awesome!! Omg I was a walk-in!

text: I’m not sure what all these other reviewers are talking about bc I had a great experience here. I tried to find glasses at my optometrist and the frames I liked were all just so expensive. I also tried to get frames through Warby Parker and just didn’t love any. I came here on a whim after feeling disappointed at my optometrist and found glasses within 30 minutes. We did have a bit of a wait to see someone and check out, but we came in RIGHT before close anyways. The guy who rang up my glasses found my insurance no problem.
